title: Social Media Manager
description:
**Company Overview:**  
Copeck Digital Media Group is a leading digital marketing agency dedicated to helping businesses maximize their online presence and engagement through strategic social media marketing initiatives. We specialize in creating and implementing innovative social media strategies that drive brand awareness, engagement, and conversions. As we continue to expand our team, we are seeking a talented and creative Social Media Manager to join us in developing and executing impactful social media campaigns for our clients.

**Position Overview:**  
We are looking for a dynamic and results-driven Social Media Manager who is passionate about leveraging social media platforms to connect with audiences and drive business growth. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of social media trends, platforms, and best practices, along with experience developing and executing successful social media campaigns. From content creation to community management, the Social Media Manager will play a key role in building and nurturing our clients' online communities and driving measurable results.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Develop and implement comprehensive social media strategies for clients, aligned with their business goals, target audience, and brand identity.
* Create and curate engaging content for social media platforms, including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, and TikTok, that resonates with target audiences and drives engagement.
* Manage social media accounts and profiles, including content scheduling, posting, monitoring, and responding to comments and messages in a timely manner.
* Conduct thorough research on industry trends, competitor strategies, and audience preferences to inform content strategy and optimization.
* Collaborate with internal teams, including designers, copywriters, and account managers, to create visual and written content that aligns with brand guidelines and objectives.
* Monitor social media performance metrics, such as reach, engagement, and conversion rates, using analytics tools (e.g., Facebook Insights, Instagram Insights, Google Analytics) and provide regular reporting and insights to clients.
* Stay up-to-date on emerging social media trends, features, and algorithms, and proactively recommend new strategies and tactics to enhance campaign effectiveness.
* Develop and execute paid social media advertising campaigns, including budget allocation, audience targeting, ad creative development, and performance optimization.
* Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, serving as the primary point of contact for all social media-related matters, and providing strategic guidance and recommendations to help them achieve their objectives.
* Continuously evaluate and optimize social media strategies and tactics to improve performance, increase brand awareness, and drive business results.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Digital Media, or related field.
* Proven experience as a Social Media Manager or in a similar role, with a strong track record of developing and executing successful social media campaigns.
* In-depth knowledge of social media platforms, algorithms, and best practices, with hands-on experience managing accounts and campaigns across various platforms.
* Strong written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to create engaging content and communicate effectively with diverse audiences.
* Proficiency in social media management tools and analytics platforms (e.g., Hootsuite, Sprout Social, Buffer, Later, etc.).
* Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities, with a passion for exploring new ideas and strategies to drive engagement and results.
* Strong project management and organizational skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
* Analytical mindset and ability to interpret data, draw insights, and make data-driven decisions to optimize campaign performance.

**Benefits:**

* Competitive salary and benefits package.
* Opportunities for professional development and training.
* Flexible work schedule and remote work options.
* Collaborative and supportive work environment.
* Opportunity to work with a diverse portfolio of clients and industries.

If you are a strategic and creative Social Media Manager looking for an exciting opportunity to make a significant impact in the digital marketing space, we encourage you to apply for the Social Media Manager position at [Company Name] today! Please submit your resume, cover letter, and any relevant portfolio or examples of past social media campaigns and successes.

title: Social Media Manager (TikTok Specialist)
description:
**Position**: Social Media Manager (TikTok Specialist)

**Company**: Soft Bulb Studios

**Location**: Remote

**Compensation**: $14/hour as a 1099 contractor

About Soft Bulb Studios:

Soft Bulb Studios stands at the cutting edge of crafting innovative and captivating gaming experiences. As we ramp up for the Kickstarter campaign of our upcoming game, "The Fourth Sense Evolution: Stone Age," we seek a Social Media Manager with a flair for social media and content creation, particularly on TikTok. This role is perfect for those who excel at generating engaging and creative content to connect with various audiences.

Role Overview:

The Social Media Manager will play a pivotal role in devising and implementing our content strategy across multiple platforms, with a special emphasis on TikTok. Your primary goal will be to produce captivating content that boosts awareness and engagement for our Kickstarter campaign. This remote, part-time contractor position offers flexibility and focuses on creativity and a structured work approach.

Key Responsibilities:

Spearheaded creative content strategies for TikTok, alongside YouTube, Reddit, and Instagram, to bolster our Kickstarter campaign.

Craft original, engaging content reflecting our brand's voice and campaign objectives.

Stay abreast of social media trends to enhance content performance through strategic insights.

Collaborate with the team on innovative marketing concepts.

Engage actively with our community across platforms to encourage positive interactions and feedback.

Analyze and report on content performance metrics to refine strategies for optimal engagement.

Required Skills:

Proficient in social media platforms, with a strong emphasis on TikTok.

Exceptional communication abilities, capable of articulating complex ideas engagingly and clearly.

Creativity and openness to innovative thinking.

A process-oriented mindset focused on continual improvement and experimentation.

Capable of working independently and as part of a team in a remote setting.

Desirable Qualities:

A passion for gaming and knowledge of the Kickstarter platform.

Experience in social media marketing or content creation.

A genuine enthusiasm for community engagement and brand development.

Compensation and Hours:

This position offers $14 per hour as a 1099 contractor, reflecting part-time involvement with negotiable hours based on the contractor's availability and project demands.

Application Process:

Candidates are required to submit their resume along with a TikTok portfolio. Applications without a TikTok portfolio will not be considered.

College students are welcome to apply.

Note: Soft Bulb Studios values diversity and inclusion and encourages applicants from all backgrounds to apply.

title: Social Media Video Specialist
description:
**Job Description**

Swappa is hiring a **Social Media Video Specialist** who thrives at creating short-form videos and UGC for platforms like TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts. We’re searching for a creative story teller who understands what it takes to drive results with modern social media and uses data as a guide for improvement.

This role will work closely with various Swappa teams and key partners to produce engaging video content while helping contribute to our overall social media and marketing efforts. This is an opportunity to drive meaningful growth for Swappa.

This is a **full-time**, **remote**, work-from-almost-anywhere role. (Part-time and contract work will be considered for the right candidate.)

**Responsibilities**

* Create Engaging Videos: Produce compelling short-form content for social media that highlights the tech we love and the great service we provide
* Edit User Generated Content: Edit user videos into branded content that helps drive commerce
* Engage Our Community: Connect with new, existing and potential users, sparking conversations and answering questions
* Expand Our Reach: Help us grow our audience, introducing more users to Swappa, our deals, and the great service we provide
* Support Marketing Efforts: Assist in content-driven marketing campaigns, ensuring content aligns with campaign goals and brand voice
* Stay Ahead of Trends: Keep current on social media trends, tools, and best practices, ensuring Swappa's content is timely, relevant, and authentic
* Report on Performance: Review content performance to determine what strategies and tactics best help accomplish our goals, including commerce and engagement
* Research and Brainstorm: Generate topic ideas that resonate with consumers looking to save money buying and selling used tech
* Communicate and Collaborate: Work and sync with various team members including marketing, support, and business development

**Qualifications and Skills**

* You have professional experience creating quality social media content and engaging with users
* You are organized, self-motivated, and capable of working independently
* You are friendly, collaborative, and experienced working with a remote, distributed team
* You are creative, yet motivated by results and hungry for data
* You have comfort and familiarity with modern social media platforms, including TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, Reddit, LinkedIn, X (even if you still call it Twitter)
* You have access to and proficiency with the tools of the trade, including the hardware and software to create and edit quality video content
* You have some experience with Google’s suite of office applications, including Gmail, Docs and Sheets
* You are able and willing to participate in occasional travel (throughout the US)

**Salary and Benefits**

* $50-75,000 salary, based on experience and execution
* Insurance provided by UnitedHealthcare (medical, dental, vision)
* Retirement plan with 3% match provided by Vanguard (SIMPLE IRA)
* Work From Home (WFO)
* Very Flexible PTO

**About Swappa**

is a community-powered marketplace for deal-seekers. Our goal is to make it safe and easy for our users to buy and sell everything from used smartphones and laptops to new sneakers. Our users expect great deals, really good support, reliable products, and low fees.

Swappa’s marketplace drives nearly $100 million in activity each year. Your job will ultimately be to drive even more commerce on Swappa by expanding our audience using social media content to capture new users.

Though we have been around a while, are bootstrapped and profitable, Swappa still operates like a startup. Everyone on our team wears many hats and does whatever it takes to get the job done. Egos are left at the door and the phrase “that’s not my job” never flies here.

You must be motivated, responsible and autonomous to be successful as a member of Swappa’s distributed team. If you’re looking to be dropped into bloated corporate machinery with year-long plans and big, predefined budgets, this is not the job for you. On the other hand, if you like the idea of working remotely for a scrappy company with big aspirations this may be a great opportunity.

**To Apply**

Swappa is building a marketing department to help us grow faster. Let us know if you think you can help by applying here:

https://swappa.wufoo.com/forms/rfcgss30qq0c83/

Job Type: Full-time

Benefits:

* Dental insurance
* Flexible schedule
* Health insurance
* Paid time off
* Retirement plan
* Vision insurance

Schedule:

* Monday to Friday

Work Location: Remote

title: Social Media Influencer Manager
description:
**University of the People** (UoPeople) [https://www.uopeople.edu/] is the **first non-profit, tuition-free, American, accredited, 100% online university**. Today, UoPeople has over 137,000 students enrolled from more than 200 countries and territories, including 16,500 students who are refugees. Currently **accredited by the DEAC**, UoPeople is also a candidate for WSCUC accreditation.

We believe that higher education is a basic human right and that it can transform not only the lives of students, but also their families' lives, their communities, their nations, and, by extension, the world. See President Reshef’s TED talk when he announced the founding of the University: [https://www.ted.com/talks/shai\\_reshef\\_an\\_ultra\\_low\\_cost\\_college\\_degree?language=en]

UoPeople is an innovative university, and we welcome team members who bring creativity and innovation to their roles. We’re a fast-paced organization with remote teams all around the globe. If you’re a self-starter who wants to succeed alongside a passionate team, we’d love to hear from you!

**Responsibilities:**

* Research and stay up to date with the latest trends and best practices in social media and influencer marketing.
* Create reports on content performance and share insights with the team.
* Collaborate with internal teams to create influencer marketing strategies that align with overall brand objectives and provide support.
* Identify and reach out to potential content creation partners through various networking channels.
* Engage with comments and mentions on social media while searching for opportunities to connect with content creators.
* Build and maintain relationships with current and potential content creator partners.
* Execute end-to-end influencer campaigns, from planning and outreach to monitoring and reporting (Build proposals, negotiate, and close influencer deals).
* Work with external agencies to identify collaboration opportunities and negotiate contracts.
* Monitor and analyze influencer campaign performance, providing insights and recommendations for continuous improvement.
* Host live events and webinars, interacting with audience members and answering questions.

**Requirements:**

* **4+ years of influencer management experience** (agency and direct)
* Extensive knowledge of **social media platforms and trends**
* Strong **customer service and communication skills**
* Ability to juggle multiple tasks and deadlines efficiently

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: Up to $60,000.00 per year

title: Social Media Manager
description:
We are looking for a Social Media Marketer with experience in X (Twitter) engagement growth. If you enjoy dating or helping other people to connect, this job may be for you!

**What You Will Need to Do**

As a Social Media Manager, you will be responsible for creating and executing our social media marketing strategy:

- Come up with creative ways to promote our services

- Create engaging content for social media posts

- Reach out to influencers in our industry

- Arrange shoutouts and other cross promotions

- Grow our social media following and engagement

This is a remote, work from home position. You will be able to set your own hours. You can work either part-time or full-time. You will need a computer with good internet connection to do this work.

**What We Are Looking for**

You will need to show us a track record of growing social media following and engagement for either personal or client accounts on X. You will also need the following skills:

- Thorough understanding of X's features, algorithm, and best practices

- Knowledge of graphics design and popular content creation tools, such as Figma, Canva, etc.

- Excellent English written communication skills

- Being able to do research and write short or long form content

- Familiarity with online dating or interest in dating in general is a plus

**What We Are Offering**

We offer a competitive salary, and you will do meaningful and exciting work in a great team!

**About Us**

Red Carpet Dating is an online dating profile management company. We work with high-value individuals, who need assistance with finding compatible matches on dating apps. As a full-service agency, we perform all online dating related tasks, from profile writing and photo selection to communicating with potential matches and scheduling dates. Visit RedCarpetDating.com for more information.

**How to Apply**

To apply, respond with your name, your best email address, and your phone number. We will contact you by email and schedule a Zoom call.

Job Types: Full-time, Part-time

Pay: From $2,600.00 per month

Expected hours: 10 – 40 per week

Application Question(s):

* Please provide an example of an X (Twitter) account that you grew to a large number of followers.
* How many followers do you have on your social media? Please give a link.
* Have you performed outreach to influencers and arranged collaborations? Please give an example.
* Have you ever created "viral content" (a post with high engagement). If so, please provide a link.

Work Location: Remote

Application Deadline: 11/25/2021

title: Social Media Manager
description:
**ABOUT US**

  

321 is a creative marketing agency using strategic data to create the kinds of meaningful moments that connect, inspire and engage. Our team looks for and values coworkers who are able to focus on what matters, bring solutions to the table, take ownership over their work, and are champions for the mood and success of their fellow teammate.

 **ABOUT THE ROLE**

  

A Social Media Manager at 321 is a forward-thinking, creative individual who manages the creation, placement and reports on the success of meaningful and engaging content the 321 develops for all social media platforms. This includes: distributing engaging content for our clients through social media according to a well organized content calendar, making strategic suggestions based on social media trends, providing project briefs and guidelines, managing regular posts by responding to followers, and providing invaluable copywriting skills. This team member provides strong, reliable support to the content team and is in touch with how to effectively promote brands through social media using best practices on each platform.

 **WHAT YOU’LL DO:**

  

* Social Network Management
	+ Demonstrate hands-on experience using social media for brand awareness and proactive community management across Facebook, Instagram, X, Threads, and TikTok.
	+ Generate, edit, publish and share engaging content daily (e.g. original text, photos, videos and news)
	+ Build out new social accounts and determine structure to achieve clients' goals.
	+ Be a responsible and professional owner of the social accounts for both 321 and clients.
	+ Communicate with followers, respond to queries in a timely manner and monitor user generated content, based on company and community policies.
	+ Demonstrate strong proofreading and written communication skills.
	+ Seamlessly adjust writing to match client brand voices and terminology.
	+ Create, manage, and adapt content calendars.

  

  



* Social Strategy Reporting
	+ Assist with the reporting on the strategy, delivery, and ongoing optimization of 321 and client social media campaigns
	+ Support the Senior Content Strategist’s social media strategy by having full understanding of the research, benchmarking, messaging, and audience identification that aligns with the client’s business goals.
	+ Actively research and contribute strategic ideas that support the benefits of each platform including Facebook, X, Instagram, Threads, Snapchat, Linkedin, Pinterest, TikTok, Tumblr, and more.
	+ Assist the Senior Content Strategist on reporting on specific objectives and ROI.
	+ Track, monitor and report on social output in order to contextualize effectiveness, and adapt and outperform benchmarks.

  

  



* Social Calendar Planning & Implementation
	+ Create and implement a social media marketing plan and editorial calendar.
	+ Write, develop, and strategize online content production and scheduling
	+ Compile monthly breakdowns of our Google Analytics and social media analytics, recommend improvements, and identify growth opportunities.

  

  



* Public Relations & Networking
	+ Support the identification of new media opportunities and communication with social media influencers.

  

  



* Internal & External Collaboration
	+ Adhere to specific brand guidelines and social media best practices, while working within budget and timeline constraints.
	+ Distill client feedback to make necessary adjustments to projects while maintaining the overall social strategy.
	+ Work closely and collaborate with project associated departments, including Creative, to deliver quality, impactful posts.

  

  



* Professional Drive & Reliability
	+ Be a self-starter and quick learner, with the ability to deliver work on time and within scope.
	+ Bring innovative, industry leading ideas to the table.

  

  



**WHAT YOU HAVE:**

  

* Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Public Relations, English Literature, Creative Writing, or a relevant field of study.
* 2+ years of agency or client-based social media management experience
* Exceptional interpersonal, written, and oral communication skills.
* Ability to work with a team, with a strong interest in cross-departmental collaboration.
* Must be professional, personable, self-motivated and flexible.
* High energy and creative with a sense of humor.
* Should possess a combination of analytical and creative skills.
* Must be able to work independently and under pressure on multiple projects and client needs.
* Must be organized, detail oriented and comfortable with change.
* Capable of managing multiple priorities in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
* Experience in all major social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, Pinterest, TikTok, and YouTube) and social media technology (Sprout, etc)

title: Social Media Apps Writer for MakeUseOf.com
description:

Are you a **Social Media Enthusiast** with a background in writing? Do you know the ins and outs of Snapchat, Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and/or Tinder?

MUO is one of the largest technology publications on the web today. We aim to equip all readers, whether they’re newcomers to tech or seasoned veterans, with the tools they need to make the most of their technology.


We simplify complex topics into guides that anyone can understand, whether they’re looking for a list of great apps, need help fixing an issue, or want a product recommendation. Every article leaves the reader with something valuable to take away.

We provide our contributors an engaging community of like-minded tech enthusiasts, a supportive and in-depth training program, and additional compensation for high quality consistent contributors!  

  

We will get back to you as soon as possible if we think you'd make a solid addition to the team.

title: Content Moderator for Ed Tech Company
description:
**About Us**

At Miaplaza, our vision is to elevate online learning and make it more effective than ever before. We apply the most successful approaches in virtual education to create a homeschool curriculum platform where students from different backgrounds can be successful, including kids with learning disabilities. Our platform allows users to personalize each student’s learning path in a way that exceeds the possibilities of the traditional classroom setting. Every lesson we develop goes through a collaborative creation process and multiple review phases from experts in different fields/disciplines. Our main K-8 curriculum platform is Miacademy, and our high school platform is MiaPrep.

We are growing! Our student base is growing rapidly and we are currently hiring for multiple positions across several departments! Our expansion stems from two key factors: our commitment to providing exceptional educational content to our students by scaling our team with passionate individuals, and our pursuit of new opportunities to enhance our students' learning experiences by broadening our capabilities and expertise as an organization.

**About the Role**

We are seeking a highly motivated and enthusiastic part-time Virtual Content Moderator to join our team! This position is focused on moderating texts, artwork, and videos posted by children in our educational website community. As a moderator, you will work 4-hour shifts, with the option to work two back-to-back shifts in a day. Additionally, staying up to date with the latest trends is crucial to better understand and relate to our young audience. There also many opportunities for growth in other areas of the company.

To get a feel for what it's like to work as a moderator at Miaplaza, please check out this TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@miaplazalearning/video/7190520345714085166

You can also hear our CEO, Johannes Ziegler, discuss our company in this podcast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7mabdbqbSco&t=23s&ab\\_channel=Universit%C3%A4tStuttgart.

**Required Skills:**

* **Tech-savvy:** Ability to quickly learn and adapt to various computer applications.
* **Trend-awareness:** Staying up to date with the latest trends to better understand and relate to the young audience.
* **Independent and self-motivated:** Being remote, you need to hold yourself accountable for tasks and ongoing responsibilities with little supervision.
* **Quick learner:** Demonstrated ability to absorb and utilize new information efficiently.
* **Detail-oriented:** Strong attention to detail to ensure content moderation accuracy.
* **Problem-solving and critical thinking:** Proven experience in independently solving technical problems and providing solutions or workarounds.
* **Excellent interpersonal and communication skills:** Exemplary written and spoken English language skills and fast typing abilities.
* **Trust & integrity:** Commitment to doing what is right and maintaining ethical standards.
* **Empathy and patience:** Ability to interact with child members and their parents compassionately and patiently.
* **Resilient and adaptable:** Capacity to take critical feedback and handle difficult customer situations effectively.
* **Team player:** Excellent communication and collaboration with internal teams and external customers.
* **Reliable high-speed internet and computer:** Access to a laptop or desktop with a high-speed internet connection that supports multitasking, including video.

**Pay:** $19.00 - $23.00 per hour

**Benefits:** We offer health, dental, and vision insurance for all full-time employees! Our health insurance will also include specialty care like fertility benefits and chiropractic care. We want our employees to have the care and support they need.

**Location:** Fully remote, but applicants must live in the U.S.

Job Type: Part-time

Pay: $19.00 - $23.00 per hour

Expected hours: 20 – 30 per week

Benefits:

* 401(k)
* 401(k) matching
* Employee assistance program
* Employee discount
* Flexible schedule
* Paid time off
* Parental leave
* Tuition reimbursement

Schedule:

* Monday to Friday
* Weekends as needed

Work Location: Remote

title: Social Media Manager
description:
**Social Media Manager for a Leading Family Law Firm** 

**Do you dream of crafting social media strategies that catapult legal professionals into online influencers?**

A leading Beverly Hills law firm seeks a **visionary Social Media Strategist & Community Manager** to take our lead attorney’s social media presence to the next level. We're not just after likes and shares; we want to turn them into a **respected figure and authoritative voice** in the family law landscape, rivaling the popularity of prominent content creators. This is a remote freelance opportunity with flexible hours and a salary commensurate with your expertise.

**About Our Firm:**

We're passionate about advocating for families and delivering exceptional legal counsel. We believe our firm’s wealth of knowledge and insightful perspective deserve a wider audience, reaching beyond traditional legal circles.

**Your Mission:**

● Develop and execute a social media strategy that elevates our lead attorney’s personal brand, **propelling him towards content creator-level visibility** in the family law sphere.

● Craft engaging and informative content across various platforms (Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, YouTube) that positions us as a **trusted resource and thought leader** on family law topics.

● **Go beyond traditional legal content:** Think creative formats, storytelling, collaborations, and innovative audience engagement tactics to grab attention and build a loyal following.

● Leverage data-driven insights to **continuously refine the strategy,** maximizing reach, engagement, and community growth.

● Cultivate a thriving online community around our firm and lead attorney: **respond to comments, host live Q&As, and nurture meaningful interactions.**

● Monitor trends and implement cutting-edge social media practices to stay ahead of the curve.

● Propose and manage impactful partnerships and influencer collaborations to further amplify our reach.

● Prepare for future growth by establishing best practices and scalable processes that will serve as the foundation for a specialized social media marketing team.

**Qualifications:**

● Proven experience crafting and executing **high-impact social media strategies for personality-based brands or content creators.** In your proposal, please showcase one specific campaign/brand, the unique strategies you implemented, and the results. Please title this as “Showcase Campaign” so we can keep an eye out for it.

● Deep understanding of social media platforms, particularly Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and YouTube, with a **focus on content formats that resonate with diverse audiences.**

● Exceptional storytelling and content creation skills, capable of translating complex legal topics into **engaging, informative, and visually appealing formats.**

● A keen eye for **strategic audience engagement and community building.**

● Data-driven approach with expertise in social media analytics and reporting.

● Experience managing and building the personal brand of public figures or online personalities.

● A collaborative spirit, ready to work cross-functionally and cultivate a team environment that encourages growth and learning.

● Familiarity with the family law landscape and potential audience demographics is a plus.

**Bonus Points:**

● Proven success in driving significant reach and engagement growth for personal brands.

● Experience with video editing, graphic design, or live streaming tools.

● Understanding of influencer marketing and partnership strategies.

**What We Offer:**

● Competitive salary based on experience and expertise.

● Opportunity to work on a groundbreaking project with a clear vision and passionate team.

● Flexible work schedule and remote environment.

● Access to ongoing support and professional development resources.

● The chance to play a pivotal role in shaping our firm’s online legacy and impacting the family law community.

● The unique opportunity to be at the vanguard of expanding our digital marketing capabilities, with a clear path to leadership and team development.

**If you're a master strategist with a flair for creative content and a passion for pushing boundaries, we invite you to submit your application! Include your resume, portfolio (including Showcase Campaign), and a brief proposal outlining your vision for our social media transformation. We can't wait to meet the visionary who will help us redefine our legal online presence!**

Job Type: Part-time

Expected hours: 15 – 20 per week

Benefits:

* Flexible schedule

Schedule:

* Day shift
* Monday to Friday

* Please attach or send Link to your portfolio.

title: Social Media Manager
description:
**Overview**

Social Media Managers are responsible for planning, implementing, managing and monitoring company Social Media strategy in order to increase brand awareness, improve Marketing efforts and increase sales.

We are looking for an experienced, passionate and creative Social Media Manager to join our team. As a Social Media Manager you will be responsible for developing and implementing our Social Media strategy in order to increase online presence and improve marketing and sales efforts for our clients. You will be working closely with the Marketing and Sales departments.

This is a 1099 contract role for 5-10 hours per week, with potential to grow. The position is 100% home-based.

Social Media Manager duties and responsibilities

* Develop, implement and manage our social media strategy including emails, blogs,newsletters, social media posts, reels, & stories
* Define most important social media KPIs
* Manage and oversee social media content
* Measure the success of every social media campaign
* Stay up to date with latest social media best practices and technologies
* Use social media marketing tools such as Meta, Metricool,
* Create copy and graphics to ensure content is informative and appealing

* Excellent multitasking skills
* Great leadership skills
* Critical thinker and problem-solving skills
* Team player

* Great interpersonal, presentation and communication skills

**Technology and Software**

title: Social Media Influencer
description:
We are revolutionizing and innovating the social media industry as a startup and are looking for the best Marketing Director we can find to help us rapidly market pre-launch and maintain our marketing needs post launch. This is a specialized position where we are looking for someone who specializes in raising/creating rapid brand awareness. We have an established, very strong brand, platform built and ready to go, and growing client interest. We have a great team so far, a great service to market for your brand, and a proven history in media helping the public.

Position Description: We are looking for an experienced professional influencer who can guarantee brand impressions, guarantee increased brand awareness, and who can help drive the public to our social media and investment platform. This is a specialized position for those who either have a very large social media following, very large social media network, very strong media platform or network, or all the above. We are looking for established influencers only who can guarantee our brand gets in front of as many eyes as possible. This is a contract-based position that will end with our product launch but could provide additional opportunities in the future based on success. The expected contract length is 1 month for the payment listed. The position is remote, work independently and your work hours are flexible, however consistent marketing metrics agreed upon before signing will be expected. Please list your social media follower count in the prescreen questions as this position is largely based on social media following.

Job Responsibilities:

· Rapidly increasing brand awareness through marketing influence, network, social media following or specialized marketing avenue

· If needed, working with Marketing Director and/or CEO to execute marketing campaigns to increase brand awareness and drive conversion to make marketing goals

Daily Tasks:

· Marketing to audience to increase brand awareness and encourage potential clients to sign up to our social media site

· Finding and targeting audiences that are good fits for our company and potential clients

· Working with our Marketing Director, CEO, or both to create and execute marketing plans

· Handling of your own social media and media accounts needed to effectively market and hit your goals

Marketing Goals (Key Performance Indicators):

· To be determined based on influencer’s marketing capabilities

Compensation:

· Initial payment at campaign start of $150+ based on follower count

· Payment tied to launch of $7,500+ based on follower count

· Promotion in our marketing campaign

Benefits:

Schedule:

* Choose your own hours

* Commission pay

title: Marketing Manager (contract)
description:

 *Please note that this is a contract role providing services to Microsoft through external staffing partners of Allegis Global Solutions. If you are selected for this role, you will be employed by AGS and will not be an employee of Microsoft.*

We're seeking a Contract Recruitment Marketing Manager focused primarily on the tactical aspects of recruitment marketing campaigns - from development and deployment to management and measurement. This role demands a clear focus on execution, an analytical approach to decision-making, and a strong ability to work within existing frameworks to optimize recruitment efforts.

title: Pinterest Social Media Manager
description:
**First Media** is a Top 10 social media publishing and marketing company at the intersection of content and commerce, driving the shoppable content revolution. Based in Los Angeles, with over 200 employees, 180 million fans, and over 1.5 billion monthly views, we’re a powerhouse of creative strategy, production, omnichannel distribution, and data. We use a proprietary formula to drive real-world action across our brands, *So Yumm*y, *Blossom*, *Blusher,* and *BabyFirst*.


We seek an experienced **Pinterest Social Media Manager** to add to our growing team (remote OK!). Reporting to our Head of Audience Development, you’ll develop and implement the social media strategy for our lifestyle brands with an eye to engagement and growth.

**You will:**

* Publish and create additional content by our Production teams and optimize it for Pinterest
* Plan, implement, and monitor the social media strategy for several large lifestyle brands to increase audience size and engagement
* Help support the development of content strategy and content calendars
* Partner closely with the analytics team to understand post performance and goals
* Research social media trends and inform management of changes that are relevant to the company’s social media strategy,
* Create Pinterest Marketing Strategies, Keyword research
* Review page/channel analytics and create reports on key metrics
* Schedule approved social posts using publishing platforms and QA to ensure accuracy

**You have:**

* A Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing or a related field
* Minimum 2 years of experience in social media community management, social media marketing, or content marketing
* Passion for social media and proficiency with major social media platforms - primarily Pinterest; IG, TikTok, Facebook, Snapchat, and YouTube a plus
* Strong familiarity with Canva, Google Sheets, Excel, Pinterest Business Hub, (measure studio is a plus), and other communication tools and the ability to learn new software quickly
* Experience in Adobe Premiere is a strong plus
* Highly developed communication skills — both verbal and written
* Good understanding of social media KPIs

title: Social Media Manager
description:
**Company Description**  

insightsoftware is a global provider of reporting, analytics, and performance management solutions that unlock the potential of business data and transform the way finance and data teams operate. We empower leaders from over 32,000 organizations to make timely and intelligent decisions. Our comprehensive solutions span Financial Planning and Analysis (FP&A), Controllership, and Data and Analytics. We deliver finance teams the insights required to navigate any economic climate and drive greater financial intelligence, while increasing productivity, visibility, accuracy, and compliance. Learn more at insightsoftware.com.

 **Job Description**  

* Lead, execute, and scale organic social campaigns for across (in order of priority) LinkedIn, YouTube, Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook.
* In conjunction with the VP of Digital Marketing, refine the annual social content strategy and monthly social calendars that support the promotion of our products, thought leadership, events, brand and company culture.
* Manage and mentor our social media associate(s).
* Oversee day to day posting cadences for all insightsoftware social media channels, with a focus on data driven optimization.
* Ensure the social media calendar aligns with relevant events and go-to-market campaign activities.
* Write, review, and oversee posting process.
* Ensure social content reflects brand voice, tone, and standards.
* Work collaboratively with Social Media Associate to deliver monthly social media reporting and metrics.
* Oversee acquisition-related social media needs including announcements, sunsetting efforts, and channel rebranding.
* Develop and socialize social media standards and best practices.
* Develop SOP documentation to support the growing social media function.
* Routinely audit the social media channels and provide recommendations to optimize.
* Collaborate with key stakeholders in marketing specifically paid digital, web, marketing ops, comms, and growth teams.
* Partner with MLT, Sales, Customer Success, and additional cross-functional teams to launch social selling and enablement programs.
* Maintain a constant pulse on our competition and deliver insights to Marketing leadership.

  

**Qualifications**  

* Minimum of 5 years social media experience, with detailed understanding of LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube. Experience with Reddit, TikTok, and others are a plus.
* Experience working for a global brand and/or B2B SaaS company preferred.
* Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or related field.
* Knowledge and passion for social media marketing trends and best practices.
* Experience developing social media SOPs/process documentation.
* Excellent writing, editing, presentation, and communication skills.
* Excellent project management skills and ability to spin multiple plates concurrently.
* Experience with Wrike project management system (or similar) preferred.
* Experience with Hootsuite, Sprout Social, or other social media scheduling platform.
* Experience working with third party agencies.
* Must be detail oriented and highly organized.
* Ability to exhibit strong interpersonal skills and build relationships across the business, at all-levels, and with agencies, customers, and professionals outside the business.
* Exhibits our core values: Results Orientation, Winning Attitude, Be One Team, Disciplined Execution, and Growth Mindset

  

**Additional Information**  

All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

title: Senior Social Media Manager - Remote
description:
**Senior Social Media Manager - Remote**



8am – 5pm PST



Do you have great social media marketing and strategy chops?



Want to be part of an amazing team, hell-bent on crafting a better future? We're always looking for creative people who care!



We are analysts. Creators. Designers. Doers. Dreamers. Explorers. Geeks. Hipsters. Leaders. Learners. Renegades. Seekers. Strategists. Visionaries. And we fundamentally believe that we're better together.



We are currently looking for a Senior Social Media Manager (SMM) to join the Designit team that supports Microsoft Cloud Marketing Social and Blog. This world-class social team operates 74+ social media channels and 17+ marketing blogs designed for developers, IT decision makers, IT implementers, and business decision makers. Each month, we publish over 3,000 social posts to help, inform, entertain, and engage community members across the globe. Azure, Power Platform, Dynamics 365, and SQL Server are just a few examples of the 170 innovative products and services that comprise the Cloud Marketing Social and Blog ecosystem.



The Senior Social Media Manager will work directly with other Senior Social Media Managers (Sr. SMM), Microsoft Blog and Social Leads (SLs), and other Agency partners. This workstream helps stakeholders across Microsoft leverage brand channels to drive impact through quality social content. In this role, you will work towards alignment across workstreams like analytics, blog, copy and creative, events, announcements, YouTube, and community management as it relates to their solution area. This will include managing content briefs and content calendars, while supporting administration with opportunities and getting involved in strategic planning and reporting. The ideal candidate has some B2B social media experience and looking to expand their knowledge. This individual enjoys fast-paced, collaborative environments and displays a 'can do' attitude. Ideally, you'll also bring first-hand knowledge of Developers, coding (including low-code dev), and the Dev audience and culture. This doesn't need to be in a professional setting – passion projects welcome!


**What you will do:**


* Identify content opportunities and provide strategic recommendations to SLs and stakeholder teams
* Oversee management of monthly organic content briefs
* Occasionally contribute to paid campaign recommendations in partnership with SLs and Microsoft paid team
* Management and ownership of editorial calendar and approving stakeholders' content requests
* Input monthly content calendar requests into Sprinklr with appropriate tags
* Proactive communication with Community Management for engagement opportunities with key audiences - UGC, retweets, GIFs, surprise and delight engagement opportunities
* Contribute to monthly analytics reports in partnership with SLs, including social listening
* Help with meeting organization and facilitation internally and with Microsoft
* Support annual planning motions and deck creation


**What you bring:**


* 6+ years of social marketing experience
* Experience in the use of social media platforms (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, etc.) with a foundational understanding of the digital marketing landscape, including paid
* Ability to work closely and successfully with clients day-to-day
* A strategic and solution-oriented mindset when working with stakeholders within the Blog and Social ecosystem
* Experience working with stakeholders to define strategy around organic and paid campaigns, including content and audience
* Proficiency in Microsoft Outlook, PowerPoint, Excel, SharePoint, and Teams
* Experience working with Sprinklr (filtering dashboards, and partnering with teams for analytics requests)
* Microsoft experience a plus


**Who you are:**


* 6+ years of social marketing experience
* Experience in the use of social media platforms (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, etc.) with a foundational understanding of the digital marketing landscape,including paid
* Experience in software, app, or other code-based development (amateur or professional, as long as you understand a Developer audience!)
* Ability to work closely and successfully with clients day-to-day
* A strategic and solution-oriented mindset when working with stakeholders within the Blog and Social ecosystem
* Experience working with stakeholders to define strategy around organic and paid campaigns, including content and audience
* Proficiency in Microsoft Outlook, PowerPoint, Excel, SharePoint, and Teams
* Experience working with Sprinklr (filtering dashboards, and partnering with teams for analytics requests)
* Microsoft experience a plus


**Compensation Range: $105,000 - $110,000**



This compensation range is indicative of the role. Compensation offered is on the basis of evaluation during interview process, the candidates range and depth of experience, business and market financials and internal pay parity.



Please note that all official communications regarding this job opportunity will be sent from email addresses ending with @designit.com. Be cautious of any correspondence originating from other email domains and refrain from sharing personal information in such cases.


**Want to know more Designit?**



Check us out online: www.designit.com. Just so you know, we don't have a dress code, but we do have a strict no jerk policy.


*Designit is committed to ensuring that all candidates have an equal opportunity to be considered for employment. Please let us know if you need any reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process.*

title: SOCIAL MEDIA SPECIALIST
description:
**Location: Remote**  

**Job Type: Contract**  

**Compensation Range: $35 - 40 per hour**



Our client is seeking a talented **Specialist in Social Media and Content Creation** to join their team and drive the brand's online presence to new heights!  

  

As a Specialist in Social Media and Content Creation, you will play a pivotal role in enhancing our brand's visibility and engagement across various social media platforms. You will be responsible for crafting compelling content that resonates with our target audience, managing social media accounts, and implementing strategies to increase our online presence and community engagement.  

  

**Responsibilities:**


* Produce and edit compelling TikTok and Reels content that drives engagement and keep brand top of mind across the ever-evolving social media landscape.
* Participate, and at times, lead brainstorms to identify new opportunities for engagement and content creation.
* Plan and publish organic social content on TikTok as assigned, including the writing of organic copy.
* Monitor and moderate all social mentions of brands across TikTok to protect the brand, inform reporting, and identify engagement opportunities.
* Identify opportunities to engage real-time with consumers on TikTok who interact with brand social channels in positive conversations.
* Identify influencers and creators who organically engage with the brand, within baking or other relevant categories that would be a good fit for brand programs and partnerships.
* Execute the organic channel and content strategy for the brand on TikTok.
* Bring brand voice to life and build a robust community of brand fans on TikTok.
* Bring a spirit of constant ideation, identifying ways to drive engagement through owned content, and participation in relevant trends and cultural conversations.
* Social listening across TikTok to identify opportunities for engagement.
* Identify relevant trends in the space to develop and execute content that allows the brand to be top of mind for our community.
* Identify key consumers to strategically execute surprise and delight opportunities to build relationships on social media.
* Continuously collaborate closely with Community Manager and brand team to execute strategy, ideate, and more.
* Bring forward social-led activation ideas, and collaborate with Community Manager to develop and execute.
* Amplify engagement opportunities that come from experiential or PR activations.
* Collaborate with Community Manager to deliver quarterly reports on performance and present to key stakeholders.
* Collaborate with stakeholders on legal process for social sweepstakes/contests in collaboration with the brand team.


**Qualifications:**


* Experience level: Entry Level
* Bachelor's Degree preferred, not required.
* Minimum of 1-3 years' experience in social media management representing a brand or organization.
* Strong content creation skills that are distinctive and reflect the brand's voice.
* Demonstrated ability to think creatively and have a strong understanding of culture.
* Proficient with content creation tools and technologies, including but not limited to iPhone, Canva Pro design, TikTok/Reels video editing, CapCut, InShot, Photoshop, etc.
* Platform expertise in TikTok, Instagram, and more.
* Exceptional understanding of the social media landscape, social analytics tools and metrics.
* Exceptional communication (written and oral) skills.
* Experience successfully managing multiple projects simultaneously, collaborating and working successfully with multiple stakeholders and teams.

title: Account Based Marketing Manager (ABM)
description:
We are looking for a talented (Senior) Account Based Marketing (ABM) Specialist who is responsible for leading the identification, development, implementation, management, and measurement of ABM in target accounts to drive pipeline, accelerate sales, and build revenue within those accounts. You will act as a liaison between the Marketing, SDR, and Sales Teams to develop strategies and tactics designed to penetrate targeted accounts. **Responsibilities:**
Work with Sales, Portfolio Marketing, and within our ABM tools to identify meaningful accounts to target with an ABM strategy
Develop custom messaging and engagement plans in targeted ABM accounts
Execute innovative and creative ABM programs across channels to generate a pipeline from concept through execution (strategy, timeline, budget, design and content support, campaign development, and campaign measurement)
Gather and coordinate analytics across various platforms (Demandbase, SFDC, Marketo, Outreach, Google) and with teams like Sales, Customer Success, SDRs, and others to gather account insights
Work with Marketing Operations and Sales to ensure campaigns are targeted to the right people and that we have the right contacts in the database
Provide ongoing data and insights that measure, analyze, and report on ABM target account penetration on a monthly, and quarterly basis as well as impact of ABM efforts on sales pipeline revenue (marketing sourced and influenced)
Develop and provide ongoing Sales communication to ensure alignment, collaboration, and follow up on ABM leads
Manage the ABM tools and tech stack including Demandbase, Sales Intelligence Elite, and others
Help promote ABM across our business by documenting and sharing best practices, driving successful campaigns, and supporting and optimizing our ABM infrastructure **Requirements:**
Minimum of 10 years of marketing experience in digital marketing, demand generation and/or ABM preferably in high-tech B2B SaaS
ABM experience in Education industry or Ed Tech moves you to the top of the list
Strong project management, organization, and time management skills required
Strong interpersonal and communication skills; ability to develop productive working relationships with Marketing, Sales, and CxO
Excellent attention to detail, ability to self-manage, problem-solving skills required
Strong willingness to test, optimize, and improve ABM programs
Experience executing innovative multi-channel marketing programs for enterprise accounts
Experience with account targeting and segmentation
Strong reporting capabilities and the ability to provide insights and analyze ABM programs
Familiarity with B2B SaaS sales cycles and how to employ marketing strategies to nurture leads and drive engagement
High proficiency across major marketing technologies, including SFDC, Marketo, Demandbase, Sendoso, Outreach
Bachelor's degree in marketing, business, or comparable education/experience **Perks & Benefits:**
Competitive salary, equity and 401k
Medical, dental, disability, and life insurance benefits
HSA program, vision, voluntary life, and AD&D
Tuition reimbursement
Paid time off, 10 paid holidays, and flexible work schedules
Lifestyle spending account

title: Part-Time Social Media Content Creator
description:
**About Us:**
Elevate Labs is on a mission to improve people's minds.  

We’ve helped millions of people around the world learn and improve concrete communication, memory, and math skills through Elevate, our first mobile app which has won Apple's App of the Year Award and been downloaded more than 60 million times. With Balance, our second mobile app and winner of Google's Best App award, we’ve personalized meditation and made it free for an entire year to help more people reduce stress, improve sleep, sharpen focus, and much more.  

Elevate Labs is a fully remote company of voracious learners and passionate doers, driven by our vision to help billions of people lead healthy, joyful, and productive lives.  

If our mission resonates with you, please consider applying! **The Role:**
Elevate Labs is seeking a **Part-Time Social Media Content Creator** to create and manage our short-form video production across multiple social media platforms. Working with the Head of Social Media, you will create authentic and engaging social content for Balance and Elevate.  

You'll have the opportunity to build both brands' TikTok presence and primarily focus on ideating, shooting, and editing content for all short-form video platforms. Expertise in these types of platforms is crucial.  

A genuine enthusiasm for social media and being online is essential, including a keen awareness of the latest trends, a deep understanding of best practices, and an appreciation for engaging with brands, fans, and more.  

This is a remote, part-time position with the opportunity to work up to 20 hours per week. **We are eager to see your video creation skills! When applying, please provide a link to your portfolio or direct links to specific videos you've created and are particularly proud of.**
### **How You’ll Make an Impact:**

+ You’ll level-up our social media videos with your knowledge and expertise in filming and editing short-form videos
+ You'll be the primary content creator for our TikTok channels, coming up with innovative and fresh ideas for our social media accounts
+ You’ll help us fuel our organic customer acquisition strategy by reaching new audiences through engaging video content.
+ You’ll regularly contribute ideas for all organic social media content
+ You’ll collaborate with the Head of Social Media and Content Team on an array/variety of social media posts to support overall strategy

### **Qualifications:**

+ Avid social media user who has a deep understanding of key platforms
+ Ability to produce, shoot, and edit short-form videos independently
+ Ability to promptly identify social media trends and respond accordingly
+ Excellent writing skills to craft compelling copy for social media posts and comment responses
+ Portfolio that showcases your social media video experience
+ Comfort with on-camera work since you'll be a regular face and voice in our content
+ Passion for working in social media
+ Experience and/or ability to work remotely

**Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity, & Inclusion:**
We believe that there is no single candidate profile that guarantees success in this role. Experience comes in different forms; many skills are transferable, and passion goes a long way. If your background is similar to the job description and you think you can excel in this role, please apply and tell us about yourself and the impact you could make at Elevate Labs.  

We also know that diversity of identity, experience, and thought leads to more creativity, better problem-solving, and wiser decisions, which is why we're dedicated to adding new perspectives to our team. We are an equal opportunity employer; committed to diversity and building an equitable and inclusive environment for people of all backgrounds and experiences, and we're taking steps to meet that commitment. We highly encourage members of traditionally underrepresented communities to apply, including women, people of color, LGBTQIA+ folks, veterans, and people with disabilities.

title: Copywriter - Social Media Content Writer
description:
**Brandout Social** is currently hiring for a **part-time Remote Copywriter - Social Media Content Writer** to research, write, and edit content for a variety of projects, including print, web, mobile, video, and social media in the **Colorado Springs, CO** area. This content writing position earns a **competitive base pay** of **$20/hour** with additional bonuses.


In addition to **competitive pay** and our **ambitious, collaborative culture**, we offer our Copywriters - Social Media Content Writers the following benefits:

* **Retirement plan**
* **Flexible work schedule**
* **Performance bonuses**


So, now that you've learned the who, what, where, and why, you may be wondering HOW to apply for this content writing job? It's easy! If you have a bachelor's degree in a related field as well as copywriting experience, just fill out our initial **mobile-friendly online application**. We hope to meet you soon!

 **DAY-TO-DAY**


This content writing position works a remote, **flexible, part-time schedule**. You would work approximately 20 hours a week.


As a Copywriter - Social Media Content Writer, you provide a vital service to our clients. They need to get the word out about their transformative services, and you are here to help. Each day, you raise the bar on creativity, writing fresh copy that connects with each client's audience and drives that audience to action. When first taking on a project, you perform research and do interviews so that you can better understand the client and their target audience. Using your versatile copywriting style, you then create content for our client in the form of a wide variety of marketing and communication materials.


Often, you brainstorm with your team to spark ideas and achieve a just-right tone. The copy you create is then presented to the client and your team for review. Always eager to grow and improve, you implement their feedback, making changes and adjustments until everyone is satisfied we've hit the mark. Once that happens, you help build out the client's calendar and schedule the content to post to social media. The turnaround time for your content writing is short, but you enjoy the fast pace of your work and the energizing feel of those creative juices flowing. You also find great satisfaction in knowing you're making a difference in so many lives!

 **ABOUT BRANDOUT SOCIAL**


At Brandout Social, we believe in humans making a human connection! Our mission is to build connections between our clients and their patients. Thousands of people have spent their time, energy, and money seeking successful pain management through self-medication, and we hope to connect them to the transformative power of chiropractic care. We partner with doctors to help them better connect with patients, and our creative gurus provide marketing and education to ensure full waiting rooms with patients awaiting personalized care!


We could not be successful in achieving our mission without our exceptional team! Our employees are **talented, enthusiastic, and creative**! We pride ourselves in maintaining a **collaborative work environment** where our employees feel free to **flex their design and creative muscles** and are supported by a **positive, team-oriented, and flexible** atmosphere.

 **OUR IDEAL COPYWRITER - SOCIAL MEDIA CONTENT WRITER**

* Collaborative - excited to connect all the dots to bring complex projects together
* Organized and punctual - manages multiple tasks and meets deadlines with room to spare
* Adaptable - works with confidence in a fast-paced setting
* Creative - innovative thinker that thinks outside of the box
* Attentive - keen eye for detail and an appreciation of great copywriting design


If this sounds like you, keep reading about this amazing content writing opportunity!

 **REQUIREMENTS FOR A COPYWRITER - SOCIAL MEDIA CONTENT WRITER**

* Bachelor's degree in journalism, English, communications, or a related discipline
* 1+ years of professional copywriting experience and a solid portfolio of work
* Exceptional content writing and research skills
* Proficiency with Microsoft Word, Excel, and Adobe Acrobat Pro


Social media or content marketing experience would be a plus. Proofreading experience and familiarity with standard style guides would also be a plus. If you meet the above requirements, we need your phenomenally unique copywriting skills. Apply today to join our team!

title: Community Manager & Social Strategist
description:
**Community Manager & Social Strategist**

Thryfty is an online e-commerce brand focused on being creative and bringing unique styles to our community. Our brand exists to build confidence and bring fun into everyday style. To do this, we need help showing off our products and engaging with our community through unique and consistent content. We are looking for a full-time Community Manager & Social Strategist to take us to the next level. We offer a flexible work schedule during the week.

**Why Our Team Needs You**

We have grown significantly recently and want to do everything we can to maintain our social growth while staying engaged with our current community and we need you to step in and help us make this happen. The Thryfty team will rely on you to ensure high-quality engagement and that a well-thought-out strategy is used to create an environment that resonates with Thryfty.

**What You’ll Do**

You’ll work alongside our other managers to ensure a cohesive brand direction is planned and executed. You will also be a resource for our pods and enable them to execute their projects to their fullest potential. As the Community Manager and Social Strategist you’ll be responsible for planning our social calendar, conceptualizing briefs and ideas, and assessing performance metrics. You’ll use your findings to continuously improve and imagine ways to drive the brand forward. We’ll expect you to maintain the world we create as we take on new projects and collections for the brand. An area we’d like to see you thrive is to utilize social media to help create seeding lists and engage with high-quality creators. Your goal is to make Thryfty known as not only a great place to get fashion pieces, but also a source of inspiration, desire, and community.

A typical routine may involve working with team pods for final release execution, communicating regularly with other team managers so everyone remains in alignment, and meeting with brand owners to discuss new projects and performance. You’ll be expected to collaborate with the team from ideation to content distribution that drives engagement. You’ll be responsible for considering how customers will engage with our pages and keeping a pulse on social trends. We want you to maintain the close-knit support we provide for our dedicated followers through responding to comments, DMs, and post sharing as well as building from the ground up a presence for Thryfty on new platforms our audiences are a part of like Discord.

**What You’ve Done**

You regularly stay plugged into the streetwear and fashion industry as well as new changes with social media platforms. You’ve also created content in-platform before and pay attention to the small details of content creation that lead to big impacts and can pick apart key indicators to what makes effective performing content. You have reached out to ideal creators for engagement and understand who would make a good partnership for Thryfty.

Ideally, you have had experience with a remote team and consider yourself to be a planner. You’re known for being great at coming up with ideas and being someone who executes their visions. Of course, you work well on a collaborative team and are into streetwear fashion, and understand the Thryfty community.

**Preferred Experience**

We don’t require experience with the platforms we use, but if you do, we want to know about it.

Here is a list of what we use frequently:

● ClickUp

● Slack

● Google Drive

● Vibe Canvas

● Zoom / Google Meet

● Instagram

● TikTok

● Discord

● CapCut

**Further Details**

● *Working Hours*: Flexible (may need to be available for team discussions between

9am-5pm EST)

● *Pay Range:* Varies based on experience

Job Type: Contract

Application Question(s):

* Why did you decide you'd like to apply for this position? What particularly about your experience makes you feel like you could handle the responsibilities?

Work Location: Remote

title: Social Media & Influencer Manager
description:
**Reports to:** Director, Brand Marketing


**Status:** Full-Time, Regular


**Exempt/Non-exempt:** Exempt, salaried


**Location:** San Francisco or Los Angeles


**About Coyuchi**



Since 1991, Coyuchi has been a leader in crafting organic linens–producing products using the most environmentally responsible methods possible. Since then, we continue to inspire the industry by focusing on the soil from which it all starts. Striving to have our fibers grown on land that is farmed in its most natural state, so we can make the smallest impact on the Earth, as we create comfort.



Coyuchi is a multi-channel retailer with a growing digital presence online at Coyuchi.com, a store in Point Reyes Station and a robust wholesale business.


**About the Role**



Coyuchi is looking for an experienced Marketing Manager that is passionate about social platforms and will be responsible for growing and managing the brand's social media footprint across META, TIK TOK, Pinterest and other platforms. As the Social Media Manager you will be creating and implementing a comprehensive social media strategy and crafting engaging and informative content with images, video, graphics and copy that align with our brand and marketing strategies. The ideal candidate enjoys getting involved at every level and is excited to work for a brand with deep roots and a rich story to tell.


* Can identify relevant social and ecommerce industry trends for in the moment content creation opportunities.
* Has a good grasp of the nuances of marketing within the home and wellness categories
* Lead monthly reporting + key insights and execute campaign-specific reports.
* Engage 1 on 1 with the consumer community to generate brand love and loyalty.
* Identify and cultivate impactful influencer relationships, unlocking new audiences, enhancing brand credibility, and fueling social commerce success


**You will be Responsible for**


* Plan and execute monthly content strategy across multiple social media platforms, primarily Instagram, Facebook, TikTok and Pinterest
* Develop detailed briefs outlining campaign goals, key messages, content pillars, platforms, tone of voice, and desired visuals.
* Strong copywriter who knows how to generate copy that is unique to the brand voice and campaigns and optimized across all social platforms based on role of the platform (top of funnel, conversion)
* Test USP and build on insights to further audience engagement
* Develop plans and tactics to grow TikTok, Facebook, Instagram etc. community and followers
* Partner with E-Com and Marketing teams to ensure all story-telling is consistent and reflective of seasonal strategies and selling priorities
* Partner with Brand Marketing and PR to drive awareness and brand buzz and create content with Influencers and Creators partners
* Leverage UGC content to enhance brand storytelling and affiliation
* Managing and executing our content calendar across all social media pages on a daily / weekly basis
* Ideate and create content for social platforms
* Aggregate data to report on social media performance for internal use
* Execute campaigns with efficiency on time


**What We're Looking For**


* 5+ years' experience in social media management with strong growth results
* Strong experience managing and growing social media communities across multiple platforms (e.g., Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, Pinterest).
* Deep understanding of the unique nuances of each platform and the ability to create engaging and effective content tailored to each audience.
* Creative eye towards elevated design, trends, style and color
* Proven ability to collaborate cross-functionally, organized and excellent communicator
* Social photography skills, Figma and Adobe a plus
* Experience creating engaging organic and paid social media content
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills to build and maintain positive relationships with partners.
* Bachelor's Degree in Marketing or related field

Full compensation packages are based on candidate experience and certifications.**Pay Range**


$90,000—$110,000 USD

title: Social Media & Video Manager
description:
Apollo.io is the leading go-to-market solution for revenue teams, trusted by over 500,000 companies and millions of users globally, from rapidly growing startups to some of the world's largest enterprises. Apollo.io provides sales and marketing teams with easy access to verified contact data for over 270 million B2B contacts, along with tools to engage and convert these contacts in one unified platform. By helping revenue professionals find the most accurate contact information and automating the outreach process, Apollo.io turns prospects into customers. Apollo raised a series D in 2023 and is backed by top-tier investors, including Sequoia Capital, Bain Capital Ventures, and more, and counts the former President and COO of Hubspot, JD Sherman, among its board members. Apollo.io is growing rapidly, with 900% revenue growth since 2021, and is looking for world-class talent to keep building with us.


**Your Mission:**



Join one of the most loved rising B2B brands online and the top community team in SaaS. This role presents a unique opportunity to expand Apollo’s brand over the coming years and shine the light on our millions of happy customers. This role is best for someone who is hardworking, creative, willing to take risks, thinks outside the box, and has the attention to detail necessary to distribute LOTS of content. The role reports to our Head of Social Media.


**Responsibilities:**


* Develop a social media strategy aligned with our business goals
* Create and post engaging content across our different social media platforms
* Guarantee consistency in brand messaging and tone across all social media channels
* Build community by replying to thousands of comments and mentions in a manner that’s aligned with our social media strategy, brand voice, and tone.
* Monitor, track, analyze and report on performance on social media platforms
* Script, create, edit, and post videos that are in sync with our short-video form strategy
* Spearhead cross-department collaboration to create content that will be posted on social media from hundreds of different sources


**Qualifications:**


* 3-5 years of community experience at a SaaS company
* Deep understanding of social media platforms, algorithms, trends, and best practices on social media marketing
* Experience building and engaging social media communities for tech brands in different platforms


**What You’ll Love About Apollo**



Besides the great compensation package and culture that thrives in openness and excellence, we invest tremendous effort into developing our remote employees’ careers. The team embraces that we have a sole purpose: to help customers maximize their full revenue potential on the Apollo platform. This mindset opens us up to a lot of creative approaches to making customers successful at scale. You’ll be a significant part of a lean, remote team, empowered to really own your role as a proactive educator. We’re very collaborative at Apollo, so you’ll be able to lean on your teammates, even in adjacent departments, to help you achieve lofty goals. You’ll be supported and encouraged to experiment and take educated risks that lead to big wins. And, you’ll have a whole team remotely by your side to help you do it!

title: Social Media Manager
description:
**Social Media Manager**

**Otium Creative - Digital Marketing Agency**

**\\*Must live in the U.S.**

**About Us:**  
Otium Creative is a dynamic digital marketing agency committed to crafting compelling online narratives for brands across diverse industries. We specialize in social media management, email marketing, paid advertising, and website design, with a passion for bringing creativity and strategy together to drive impactful results.

**Position Overview:**  
We are seeking a talented and experienced Social Media Manager to join our innovative team. As a Social Media Manager at Otium Creative, you will play a pivotal role in developing and executing social media strategies that elevate our clients' online presence, engage target audiences, and drive meaningful results. This positions provides a flexible scheduele, ability to work from anywhere, and the ability to essentially choose your own hours. You also have the opportunity to grow within the company and move up roles (such as Account Director, Lead Strategist, COO).

This position is hourly based, and starts part time with 1-2 clients. After a 1-3 months, if things are running smoothly we will work with you on your scheduele, and eventually your work load will become full time with an expectation of 3-4 clients managed. You also have pay increase opportunities over time in the company.

**Responsibilities:**

* Develop and implement comprehensive social media strategies aligned with client objectives
* Create, curate, and manage engaging content across various social platforms
* Monitor and analyze social media performance metrics, providing actionable insights and recommendations
* Present analytical reports to clients including suggestions and SMART goals
* Keep up with industry trends, platform updates, and emerging social media technologies
* Collaborate with clients and internal teams to ensure cohesive and effective digital campaigns
* Foster community engagement and build brand loyalty through authentic online interactions
* Create graphics and video edits for social media posts
* Create in depth copy for posts and captions that is on brand for your cleints

**Requirements:**

* Proven experience as a Social Media Manager or similar role
* In-depth knowledge of social media platforms, trends, and best practices
* Strong content creation and copywriting skills
* Proficient in social media analytics and reporting
* Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities
* Creative mindset with the ability to think strategically

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field (preferred but not required)
* Minimum of 2 years of experience in social media management
* Experience working with a diverse range of clients and industries is a plus

**How to Apply:**  
Please submit your portfolio of graphics, posts, past instagram accounts, video edits, and a short paragraph explaining your social media marketing experience to ethan@otiumcreative.com. I am not interested in a resume, I am really looking to see what you can do with graphic design, and copywriting.

**Join us at Otium Creative and be part of a team that thrives on creativity, innovation, and delivering exceptional digital experiences!**
