title: Social Media Manager
description:
LitJoy Crate is a one-stop shop for book lovers that offers beautiful books and clever collections to inspire and connect people with fictional worlds. We are looking for a Social Media Lead to help with managing our social media platforms.

**Position Description:**

We are seeking a creative and enthusiastic Social Media Lead to join our bookish ecommerce business and take our social media presence to the next level. As a Social Media Lead, you will play the leading role in development of our social media strategies to expand our audience, engage our current audience, drive brand awareness, and promote our products.

You will be responsible for growing our social media platforms, creating and curating video/visual content, interacting with followers, monitoring social media trends, and analyzing performance metrics. This is an excellent opportunity to contribute to a growing company in the special edition book and book subscription industry and make a meaningful impact on our online presence.

This role reports to the Marketing Lead and manages Social Media Assistant personnel. You will work collaboratively with the other members of the Marketing department to create the most effective outcome for LitJoy as a company. You should have excellent communication skills, high attention to detail, and be self-motivated and a team player. You should also be able to keep projects organized, be able to have a customer service mindset and meet deadlines.

**Compensation:**

* $45,000/year

**Benefits:**

* Employee discount
* Flexible schedule

**Schedule:**

* Monday - Friday, and some weekends, 40 hours per week
* This is a full-time position starting at 40 hours per week. You will have some flexibility in setting your own schedule when working on our social media platforms but will definitely need to participate in team meetings and be available to respond to any internal communication between the hours of 9am and 5pm MST, Monday – Friday.

**Work Remotely:**

* Yes

**You are who we are looking for if:**

As a fast-paced and expanding company, we are seeking a team player who appreciates a creative work environment as much as we do. If you possess the following qualities that match LitJoy's values, then you are who we are looking for:

* Heart: You love learning new things and are quick to adapt to change
* Synergy: You are willing to take direction and work with a team, but also are able to get things done independently
* Creativity: You are a think-outside-the-box type of person
* Extreme Ownership: You are hardworking and dependable
* Clear Communication: Providing feedback, insight, and thoughtful suggestions are part of who you are

**Responsibilities:**

As a Social Media Lead, you will be responsible for the following:

* Social Media Strategy
* Develop and execute a comprehensive social media strategy aligned with the company's goals.
* Content Planning
* Plan and schedule content across various social media platforms, ensuring a consistent posting schedule.
* Content Creation
* Oversee the creation of engaging and visually appealing social media content, including graphics, videos, and written posts.
* Audience Engagement
* Monitor comments, messages, and mentions, responding to inquiries and engaging with the audience to build relationships.
* Community Management
* Foster and grow online communities, forums, or groups related to the company's niche.
* Analytics
* Monitor and analyze social media performance using analytics tools to optimize strategies and report on KPIs.
* Trend and Platform Awareness
* Stay updated on social media trends, platform updates, and algorithm changes to adapt strategies accordingly.
* Competitor Analysis
* Research and analyze competitors' social media strategies to identify opportunities for improvement.
* Brand Voice and Guidelines
* Maintain a consistent brand voice and ensure all content aligns with the brand guidelines.
* Crisis Management
* Develop a crisis management plan and respond to negative comments or PR issues professionally.
* Collaboration
* Collaborate with other departments, such as marketing, content creation, and customer support, to ensure consistency in messaging.
* Influencer Partnerships
* Identify and collaborate with relevant influencers or brand ambassadors.
* Hashtag and social SEO Research
* Research and recommend relevant hashtags and keywords to improve post visibility.
* Trend Research
* Help research and report on trending topics or challenges that align with the brand.
* Monitoring Alerts
* Keep an eye on social media alerts and notify the lead of any urgent issues or trends.
* Social Listening
* Monitor conversations and mentions related to the brand to identify opportunities for engagement.

**Education, Experience, and Requirements:**

The ideal candidate will possess:

* A minimum of 2-4 years of social media marketing experience
* Experience growing large accounts with over 100-150K followers is preferred
* Previous experience working with social media platforms for a business, preferably in the ecommerce or bookish/publishing industry.
* Strong understanding of social media platforms, their features, and best practices for audience engagement.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to craft engaging and compelling content.
* Proficiency in social media management tools and analytics platforms.
* Knowledge of current trends and developments in social media, particularly within the bookish and literary communities.
* Familiarity with graphic design tools (e.g., Canva) and basic image editing skills.
* Proficiency in video creation/editing through social media apps like TikTok and Instagram Reels.
* Detail-oriented and highly organized, with the ability to manage multiple tasks and prioritize effectively.
* Creative mindset with a passion for books, reading, and literature.
* Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to work collaboratively with a team.

**How to Apply:**

* If you think you would be the best candidate for this position, please email Joseph at jobs@litjoycrate.com and include your resume and a short paragraph on why you feel you are a good fit for this position.
* If you love books, please tell us your favorite book series.
* Submit your portfolio of graphics/videos that you have created for social media.
* Include any viral TikToks or Reels if you have created any
* Submit any general stats for large accounts that you have accomplished.
* Use the subject line: Social Media Lead. Please note: If you don't use that exact subject line your email will not be opened.

title: Social Media Manager
description:
**Job Title:** Social Media Manager


**Department:** Communications


**Location:** Remote


**Reports To:** VP of Corporate Communications

  


**SUMMARY**



The primary responsibilities of the Social Media Manager are to develop and lead the execution of the company's and its subsidiaries' social media strategies and to support the broader efforts of the marketing and communications (MarComms) department. The MarComms team's primary mission is to clearly communicate and effectively promote the company's mission, milestones, products, brand, and broader strategic initiatives to its various stakeholders. We are the defenders of the brand and the voice of the company. We are creators, educators, and evangelists, who value integrity, transparency, and clarity, and who strive for excellence in all things.

  


**ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES** include the following. Other duties may be assigned.



* Develop and execute an effective social media strategy to enhance the company's and its subsidiaries' brand visibility, engagement, and reputation across various social media platforms.


* Manage all social media channels, create content, schedule posts, engage the community, and track analytics.


* Develop and implement social media campaigns to support key company announcements, initiatives, and product launches.


* Monitor social media trends and industry best practices; provide insights to internal stakeholders and adjust social media strategies as needed.


* Collaborate with internal teams (marketing, design, legal, etc.) to ensure all social media content aligns with the company's values and objectives.


* Build relationships with industry influencers to expand the company's reach and enhance the brand's credibility.


* Manage social media advertising campaigns, including budget allocation, targeting, and performance tracking.


* Respond to stakeholder inquiries, comments, and messages on social media platforms in a timely and professional manner.


* Analyze social media performance metrics and prepare regular reports to evaluate the effectiveness of social media efforts and inform future strategies.
  


**QUALIFICATIONS:** To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform essential functions.


* 4+ years of experience in social media management and product marketing, preferably in the technology, energy, or Bitcoin industry.
* Proven experience developing and executing social media strategies for multiple brands across various platforms, including Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram, and YouTube.
* Strong analytical skills with the ability to monitor social media analytics and industry trends, derive insights, and provide guidance on a constantly evolving social media and product marketing strategies.
* Exceptional verbal and written communication skills with the ability to create engaging and compelling content for social media platforms and product marketing materials.
* Attention to detail is a must.
* Creative thinking and the ability to generate innovative ideas for social media campaigns, content, and product marketing initiatives.
* Experience managing social media advertising campaigns, including budget allocation, targeting, and performance tracking.
* Strong organizational skills. A history of balancing competing priorities with the ability to adapt to the changing needs of the business while meeting deadlines. Strong project management skills with the ability to manage time-sensitive projects.

  


**PERSONALLY, YOU HAVE**


* Integrity, empathy, curiosity, and a sense of humor.
* A knack for explaining complex ideas simply and concisely.
* Intrinsic motivation and a strong entrepreneurial spirit – you take charge, solve problems, and "think outside the blocks."
* A willingness to roll up your sleeves and tackle the day-to-day tasks balanced with an ambition to evolve into a leadership role.
* A passion for Bitcoin and a strong understanding of how Bitcoin and bitcoin mining work, or the desire to learn quickly.
* A belief that one should get rich or die mining.


***Marathon Digital Holdings is an Equal Opportunity Employer***

title: Social Media Manager
description:
Plume Health is a passion-fueled, mission-driven company that is trans-founded and focused on radically increasing access to healthcare for the trans community, supporting a bold, authentic and healthy lifestyle. We hope to make gender-affirming hormone therapy easily accessible at the touch of a button in every state of the US. We are an organization by and for trans folks and we want heart-forward, awesomely talented teammates to join us on our journey.  

This work is deeply personal and heart-driven, and we want teammates who, above all else, care about the mission and the people we serve. For the right candidates, we present a rare opportunity to do well by doing good. Plume offers an affirming, trans-centered, culturally inclusive and fun work environment filled with purpose.  

We are seeking a creative and strategic Social Media Manager to join our team. As the Social Media Manager, you will be responsible for developing and executing social media strategies to enhance brand awareness, engage with our audience, and drive business objectives. You will oversee all aspects of our social media presence across various platforms, ensuring consistency in messaging and branding while staying up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in social media marketing. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of social media analytics, excellent communication skills, understanding of the transgender and gender-non-conforming community, and a passion for storytelling.
### **Responsibilities: Strategy and Planning**

* Develop and execute comprehensive organic social media strategies aligned with company goals.
* Stay updated on industry trends and competitor activities.
* Plan and execute social media campaigns to promote products, events, or initiatives.
* Ensure inclusivity and sensitivity in campaigns, particularly towards the TGNC community. Ensure campaigns are accessible to a broad range of experiences.

### **Responsibilities: Content Management**

* Create, curate, and schedule engaging and shareable content across platforms.
* Collaborate with the Marketing team and graphic agency to create visually appealing and on-brand content.
* Oversee day-to-day execution of social media content by scheduling posts.
* Monitor and optimize posting times for maximum reach and engagement.
* Integrate social media into broader marketing campaigns.

### **Responsibilities: Community Engagement and Analytics**

* Monitor social media channels for brand mentions and relevant conversations.
* Respond to comments, messages, and inquiries promptly and professionally.
* Cultivate positive relationships with the online community.
* Track key social media metrics, analyze performance reports, and provide insights for improvement.
* Provide weekly insights and recommendations to enhance social media effectiveness.

### **The Social Media Manager will be responsible for the following Key Process Indicators (KPIs)**

* Follower Growth: Increase in the number of followers across social media platforms over time.
* Engagement Rate: Measure the level of interaction (likes, comments, shares, etc.) per post relative to the total number of followers.
* Reach: Measure the total number of people who have seen the content posted by the social media manager.
* Click-Through Rate (CTR): Measure the percentage of users who click on a link or call-to-action in a social media post.
* Customer Sentiment: Monitor and analyze comments, mentions, and messages to gauge overall sentiment towards the brand or organization.
* Content Performance: Evaluate the performance of individual posts or content types to identify what resonates best with the audience.
* Response Time: Measure the average time it takes for the social media manager to respond to inquiries or comments.
* Social media referral traffic: Measure the effectiveness of social media campaigns in achieving specific goals (e.g., product promotion, event attendance, etc.).

### **Qualifications**

* At least three years of proven experience as an effective Social Media Manager or in a similar role.
* Familiarity with social media management tools and analytics platforms.
* In-depth knowledge of social media platforms, trends, and best practices, specifically Instagram, TikTok, Reddit and Threads.
* Experience working with Product teams to determine data sources and operations for data collection and visualization.
* Ability to analyze data and derive insights to improve strategy.
* Strong project management skills, leading with and holding oneself and others accountable to clear goals, deadlines, and cross-functional accountabilities.
* Strong creative skills with an eye for visual aesthetics.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
* Demonstrated success in growing and engaging social media audiences. Healthcare industry and/or member subscription industry is a plus.

**Benefits and Perks:**  

Ground-Floor Equity for all employees (Series B)
Free Medical, Dental, Vision for employees
Unlimited PTO
11 paid holidays and company shut-down for a week in December
401(k)
Free Plume and Mental Health Subscriptions
The best coworkers you could imagine, if you love fiercely intelligent, heart-open, mission-driven collaborators.  

  

Plume is an equal-opportunity employer. Trans and gender-nonconforming individuals are strongly encouraged to apply, particularly those who identify as people of color. We positively encourage applications from suitably qualified and eligible candidates regardless of age, color, disability, national origin, ancestry, race, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, veteran status, genetic information, or any other status protected by applicable law. We will provide reasonable accommodations to individuals with disabilities upon request. Please let us know if you require any accommodations to apply or interview for this position.  

Discover more about Plume at www.getplume.co and become part of our award-winning journey towards transforming healthcare for every trans life. Join us today in shaping the future of healthtech and LGBTQ+ care!

title: Virtual Assistant/Social Media Manager
description:

title: Social Media Manager
description:
We are Vicarious, a kickass staffing agency for creative professionals. We’re currently seeking Social Media Managers of all levels to work with our awesome clients.
As a Social Media Manager, you will play a crucial role in shaping our online brand image, engaging with our audience, and driving business growth. You will be responsible for developing and executing our social media strategy across various platforms, including but not limited to LinkedIn, Twitter/X, TikTok, Instagram, and Facebook. The ideal candidate is a creative and data-driven professional who is passionate about social media trends and understands how to leverage them for business success.  

  

 In this role, you will be responsible for:

* Social media strategy: develop and execute an effective social media strategy that aligns with Vicarious' business goals, brand identity, and target audience.
* Content creation: create engaging and relevant content, including text, images, videos, and infographics, that resonates with our audience and showcases our expertise in creative staffing.
* Community engagement: foster a strong online community by responding to comments, messages, and mentions promptly and professionally. Encourage conversation and interaction among our followers.
* Content scheduling: plan and schedule social media posts in advance to ensure consistent and timely content delivery. Use social media management tools to streamline the process.
* Analytics and reporting: monitor and analyze social media performance using data and analytics tools. Provide regular reports and insights to track the effectiveness of campaigns and make data-driven improvements.
* Campaign management: develop and manage social media campaigns, contests, and promotions to increase brand awareness and engagement.
* Stay updated: keep up-to-date with the latest social media trends, algorithm changes, and best practices. Apply this knowledge to improve Vicarious' social media presence continually.
* Collaboration: work closely with the marketing team to ensure social media efforts align with overall marketing and business strategies.



In order to qualify, please have:
Proven experience as a Social Media Manager or similar role.
In-depth knowledge of social media platforms, trends, and best practices.
Strong written and verbal communication skills.
Creative thinking and the ability to create engaging content.
Proficiency in social media management tools and analytics platforms.
Excellent time-management skills and the ability to work independently in a remote setting.

Why Vicarious:
100% remote work: enjoy the flexibility to work from anywhere.
Competitive salary and benefits package.
Opportunity to work with a dynamic and creative team.
Join a growing company at the forefront of remote work trends.

If you are a passionate and creative individual with a strong understanding of social media and a desire to help shape the online presence of leading creative clients, we encourage you to apply.  


*Vicarious is an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.*

title: Social Media Manager
description:

Please submit your resume, portfolio, and your social accounts to your application

title: Social Media Manager
description:
``**Company Overview:**

Our company is where innovations meet authenticity in the realm of modern media. We are not just content creators; we’re storytellers, visionaries, and pioneers of the digital age. With a passion for pushing boundaries and a commitment to excellence, our company stands at the forefront of the media landscape, shaping trends and redefining standards.

**Position Overview**

In this role, you'll be working closely with the CEO to create and edit content on all the company’s social media platforms. This is a remote contract position that will potentially become a part-time position then a full-time position.

**Responsibilities:**

· Execute a strategically driven content calendar across all social media platforms, primarily Instagram, TikTok, X and the company’s blog.

· Develop innovative and disruptive ways to promote our products and support brand objectives.

· Be our in-house expert on social media trends to by providing and educating on best practices for different social channels and content formats, including new and emerging platforms or algorithm changes.

· In this role, you are responsible for developing and maintaining our social media and content strategy, calendar for campaign.

· Manage day-to-day posting and execute strategies across all the company’s platforms: Instagram, TikTok, X, YouTube and the company’s blog.

· Generate, edit, publish and share engaging video content.

· Building and moderating social media communities by responding to comments and keeping members engaged

· Monitoring key performance indicators (KPIs)—like link clicks, likes, and other metrics

· Establish and adhere to internal social media content standards to set a high bar for brand value and credibility among customers, audiences, and competitors.

· Suggest new/experimental trends and initiatives, as well as changes to existing practices.

· Performs other projects or miscellaneous duties as requested or assigned.

**Qualifications:**

· 5+ years’ experience at a global brand managing social media channels

· Impeccable creative briefing skills 

· A deep appreciation for cultural, internet and content trends 

· Familiarity publishing and working on social platforms including but not limited to Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, Tik Tok, Snap Chat 

· Must have video editing skills

· Solid Knowledge of SEO Optimization

· Exceptional interpersonal and organizational skills

· A passion for collaboration and fruitful communications  

· Proven track record of organically growing social channels   

· Strong presentation skills

· Project management expertise

**Benefits:**

Salary is Negotiable.

Job Type: Contract

Pay: $35.00 - $40.00 per hour

Schedule:

* 8 hour shift

Experience:

* Social media management: 5 years (Required)

Work Location: Remote

title: Digital Marketing Specialist - Social Media & PPC
description:
**Digital Marketing Specialist - Social Media & PPC Focus**

  



Location: Provo Utah (Local Applicants Only)

  


**About DentalCMO:**



DentalCMO is on the lookout for a talented Digital Marketing Specialist with a dual focus on Social Media ad buying and PPC to join our team. As a growing dental marketing company, we are dedicated to delivering innovative marketing solutions that drive results. If you are creative, analytical, and passionate about leveraging social media platforms and PPC campaigns to enhance online visibility and engagement, you might be the perfect fit for our team.

  


**Key Areas of Responsibility:**


* Social Media Management: Develop and implement social media strategies to increase engagement, brand awareness, and drive traffic across platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn.
* PPC Campaign Management: Plan, execute, and optimize PPC campaigns across Google AdWords, Bing Ads, and social media platforms to achieve targeted results and maximize ROI.
* Client Onboarding: Efficiently onboard new clients to our platforms, ensuring a clear understanding of their goals and how our social media and PPC strategies will meet their needs.
* Continuous Communication: Keep clients informed through regular updates, weekly calls, and emails, ensuring transparency and client satisfaction.
* Content Collaboration: Work closely with the content team to create compelling, targeted content for social media posts and PPC ads.
* Analytics and Reporting: Monitor, analyze, and report on the performance of social media and PPC campaigns, utilizing data to inform and adjust strategies as needed.
* Quality Assurance: Oversee all content and campaigns, ensuring they align with client objectives and DentalCMO’s standards before publication.
* Community and Relationship Building: Manage online communities, engage with audiences, and foster positive relationships through interactive and engaging communication.

  


**Essential Skills:**


* Proficiency in managing social media platforms and PPC campaigns.
* Strong understanding of analytics tools such as Google Analytics, Facebook Insights, and PPC reporting tools.
* Excellent organizational skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects and clients simultaneously.
* Outstanding communication skills for effective client and team interactions.
* Creative thinking with the ability to generate innovative ideas and strategies.

  


**Qualifications:**


* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
* Demonstrated experience with social media management and PPC campaign execution (a must).
* Expertise in using collaboration tools like GSuite, Asana, HubSpot, and Slack.
* Familiarity with social media scheduling and analytics tools.

  


**Personal Attributes:**


* A detail-oriented and punctual professional with a positive attitude.
* A team player who is energetic, enthusiastic, and client-focused.
* Adaptable and open to continuous learning and development in digital marketing trends and tools.

  


**Compensation and Benefits:**


* Competitive salary.
* Two weeks of paid time off per year, plus all typical holidays.
* 401K / HSA options.
* Paid access to a local physician for the employee and their family.

  


**DentalCMO Core Values:**


* We Are Ridiculously Responsive.
* Our Clients Are Our Friends.
* We Take Pride in Our Craft.
* We Are Givers.
* We Practice Kaizen.
* We Are Wise Stewards.
* We Are Professional and Have Fun.

  


**Application Process:**



Interested candidates should submit a cover letter detailing why they are the ideal fit for the Digital Marketing Specialist position, **emphasizing their experience in social media and PPC related work**. Join our Provo-based team and play a significant role in our clients' success stories.

title: Director, Social Media
description:

Remote

Thurgood Marshall College Fund (TMCF) is the nation’s largest organization exclusively representing the Black College Community. TMCF member-schools include the publicly-supported Historically Black Colleges and Universities (HBCUs) and Predominantly Black Institutions (PBIs).

Seeking an experienced Director, Social Media to manage our online presence, with a particular emphasis on our organizational initiatives. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating original text and video content, managing posting schedules, and interacting with our audience. This role is crucial in preserving and improving TMCF's image, guaranteeing a consistent brand message in line with our marketing goals.

title: Digital Marketing Associate
description:
Designity is seeking a customer-centric and self-starter for the role of Digital Marketing Associate at Designity. This role is hybrid which means you will be working on internal Designity projects and assisting with Designity client projects from time to time. Your position involves leveraging expertise in Social Media Management, Google Ads, crafting content calendars and in general collaborating directly with our marketing team to brainstorm and launch new campaigns based on recent trends. Your roles would be mostly following directions and executing on projects and monitoring metrics.

Designity is a subscription-based collaborative creative platform that enables creatives and businesses to collaborate more effectively through unique and innovative model. This collaborative approach has convinced both small and large companies, including Calendly, Kung Fu Tea, and Marriott Hotels, to use Designity for their design and marketing efforts instead of traditional, costly, and inefficient alternatives.

We are transforming the creative industry, moving away from outdated and ineffective marketing and design methods. Companies typically hire in-house designers, which is costly, time-consuming, skill-limiting, and requires substantial supervision. Working with traditional design and marketing agencies offers an alternative but at a high cost. Marketplaces like Upwork and Fiverr claim to offer a more affordable solution, but their model lacks reliability and optimization for creative services, causing frustration for businesses.

While we still operate like a startup, we are in full scale- up mode. If you are looking for a clear career growth plan, fully remote, and the opportunity to join a growing team that is disrupting the creative industry - then Designity is the place for you.

**Responsibilities:**

* **Execute Marketing Initiatives:**
* Execute on marketing projects alongside your team.
* Leverage storytelling and creative problem-solving skills.
* Drive brand awareness through brainstorming, concept development, and audience captivation.
* **Develop Unique Strategies:**
* Generate recommendations for inbound and outbound marketing tactics based on latest trends.
* Set up and manage paid/unpaid social media campaigns, Google Ads, and email campaigns.
* Implement A/B testing strategies.
* **Measure and Report:**
* Monitor and report on marketing campaign performance.
* Gain insights and assess results against client goals as well as Designity projects.
* **Digital Marketing Project Management:**
* Complete high-quality and on-schedule digital marketing projects.
* Serve clients across a variety of industries.

**Qualifications:**

* **Digital Marketing Expertise:**
* Minimum of 2-3 years in digital marketing with a focus on social media content management, and paid media, ideally with B2B companies.
* **Passionate Consumer Driver:**
* Enthusiastic about influencing consumer behavior through digital advertising.
* **Social Media Management Skills:**
* Experience in social media content calendar management.
* **Analytical Proficiency:**
* Exceptional analytical skills with hands-on experience using various tools such as GA4, Hotjar, Optimizely, Google Console Analytics, etc…
* **Campaign Development and Measurement:**
* Thorough understanding of developing and measuring successful digital campaigns and promotions.
* **Organized and Deadline-Oriented:**
* Highly organized with a commitment to deadlines, consistently delivering high-quality projects.
* **Proactive Planning:**
* Ability to create initial plans with minimal input, seeking feedback for necessary updates and revisions.
* **Motivated Team Player:**
* Hands-on, self-driven, highly motivated, and team-oriented with an entrepreneurial mindset.

‍**ADDITIONAL INFO:**

* Fully remote option.
* Clear Career growth plan
* “No Meetings Wednesday”
* 401k and Health Insurance Benefits after 3 months
* Unlimited paid vacation, company holidays, and mental health days

*Compensation: $65,000 - $85,000 (total of commission and base)*

*In order to be considered for this position, you need to complete the application process at www.designity.com/careers/digital-marketing-associate*

*Please do NOT follow up on your application. We will be in touch within 2-3 weeks if you're qualified.*

*At Designity, all employment decisions are based on business needs, qualifications, and merit. Designity is an Equal Opportunity Employer. The more inclusive we are, the better our work will be. We believe that a workforce diverse in cultures, perspectives, skills, and experiences will benefit our team, clients, and products.*

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $65,000.00 - $85,000.00 per year

Benefits:

* 401(k) matching
* Flexible schedule
* Health insurance
* Life insurance
* Paid time off

Schedule:

* 8 hour shift
* Monday to Friday

Work Location: Remote

title: Content & Social Media Specialist
description:
**Site Overview:**


Young Innovations is a manufacturer and marketer of high-quality dental equipment with sales in excess of $100 million. With an outstanding reputation for quality, the company has a broad portfolio of market leading products across a variety of categories.

**Role Overview:**


Young Innovations is looking for a talented Content & Social Media Specialist to manage and enhance our online presence across digital and social channels such as YouTube, LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram and TikTok, and other channels as our business evolves. The ideal candidate has a flair for creativity, an in-depth knowledge of the dental industry, excellent communication skills, and a proven track record in developing engaging and shareable content. Help us nurture and grow our vibrant online community with content that not only educates and informs, but also heavily engages our clinically minded audience.

**Responsibilities:**

* **Content Creation:** Develop high-quality and visually appealing short-form, digital-first content that educates clinicians about our products through the development images, videos, graphics and articles tailored for various social media platforms.
* **Technical Understanding:** Evaluate and review content and training materials related to dentistry, translating complex concepts into compelling and accessible content for our online audience.
* **Platform Management:** Oversee and maintain our presence on social media channels, such as YouTube, LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, etc., ensuring that content reflects our expertise and passion for the dental industry.
* **Audience Engagement:** Engage with our audience by promptly responding to comments, messages and inquiries in a professional and informative manner.
* **Community Building:** Foster an active and engaged online community by encouraging discussions, sharing user-generated content and organizing online events centered around dental education.
* **Analytics and Reporting:** Monitor, track and report on the performance of social media campaigns, offering insights and recommendations for improvement.

**Related Duties**:

* **Content Strategy Development:** Develop and implement a comprehensive social media content strategy that aligns with the company's branding and marketing goals.
* **Trend Analysis:** Stay current on dental industry trends and best practices in social media marketing, integrating relevant insights into our strategy with a focus on educational and product-centered content.
* **Collaboration:** Work closely with the marketing team to ensure that social media campaigns align with larger marketing initiatives. Identify and cultivate partnerships with key industry influencers to expand our reach within the online dental community.
* **Brand Consistency:** Maintain consistent messaging and visuals across all platforms, ensuring adherence to our brand guidelines.

**Qualifications:**


Training and Experience

* 2-5 years of experience in dental hygiene with a keen interest in content creation.
* 1-2 years of experience in social media content creation.


Education

* Associate’s degree in dental hygiene or a relevant field


Knowledge, Abilities and Skills

* Knowledge of various social media channels relevant to dental industry (TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, LinkedIn).
* Strong knowledge of clinical research concepts, practices and regulations related to dental industry.
* Ability to create relevant content independently with minimal direction and meet specified timelines.
* Ability to communicate with teams, setting realistic timeline expectations, monitor and communicate progress against milestones, and escalate complex issues appropriately.
* Proficiency in MS Office Suite, project management software (e.g., Wrike, Trello, Monday.com), and familiarity with Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, Premier Pro).

**PhysicalRequirements:**


Working Conditions


Office environment and occasional exposure to manufacturing plant environment, with some abnormal variations in temperature, unavoidable fumes, noise, dust and atmospheric conditions.


This position requires the ability to travel approximately 15% of the time.

**Pay Range:** $63,000 - $75,000.


The pay range reflects the minimum and maximum target for the position at the time of posting. Within the range, the compensation will be determined based on education/training, skill set, experience, and other organizational needs.

*Young Innovations, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer and E-Verify participating employer.*

title: Social Media Manager
description:
### **At Havenly Inc., we believe that everyone deserves a beautiful home they love. Founded in 2014, we've grown into the #1 interior design service in the country. Together, with our family of brands (Interior Define and the Inside), we're reinventing the way that people design and shop for their homes, making custom furniture and interior design delightful and accessible for all.**

  



Calling all social groundbreakers – we're hiring! We're on the hunt for a creative savant with content-creator DNA to own the day-to-day operation of our social channels and fuel brand growth (and affinity!). The perfect candidate is a captivating storyteller, brilliant video producer, clever copywriter, and energetic go-getter with excellent audience and brand instincts. Your role: bring our brand story to life in social in new and exciting ways – and nurture a thriving community.

  



Sure, we're a little biased, but here's why the gig is so great:

  



 We're assembling a stellar social team and need a dynamic visual storyteller to execute (and elevate) the brand vision.



 Status quo is boring; we want someone who is insatiably curious, eager to explore new creative territories, and always up to engage our audience in new ways.



✨ Rockstars and go-getters make up our team, so if that's you as well… you'll feel right at home. And it makes solving the big problems way more exhilarating.



 We're redefining how people design and shop for home: making it accessible, simple, and fun. Shift culture with us.


**What You'll Do:**


* **Craft Captivating Content:** Shape engaging narratives and visuals, ensuring best-in-class content uniquely tailored to specific social channels – and reflects our brand vision and creativity. Given today's social media landscape, scroll-stopping video content creation will be a key focus, and TikTok a prime platform.
* **Transform Wits Into Wins:** You view everything you create as truly clever craftsmanship. Using your insanely smart wit, you'll turn ordinary content into extraordinary moments – outwitting trends, charming your way through copy, dazzling with video edits, and more.
* **Build Our Tribe:** Foster meaningful connections with our customers by executing innovative campaigns and initiatives that encourage active participation and dialogue. You will foster real-time responses and thoughtful connections to curate a vibrant, engaged community across our family of brands.
* **Unleash Your Data Genius:** You're all about understanding what works – and what doesn't. Deep diving regularly into the data as well as community observations, you'll help refine our social strategy and optimize content based on real-time insights.
* **In Tune With Trends:** Obsessively monitor social trends and cultural nuances to create the most relevant – and resonate – stories that get people talking. You don't just follow trends, you help redefine them in new and innovative ways.
* **Multitasking Maven:** You won't just juggle balls, we need a Cirque du Soleil level operative. With multiple brands under your direction, you'll be expected to navigate role responsibilities, channel content calendars, and business needs for the most efficient – and effective – social operations. And never miss a detail at that.
* **Collaborate Like a Pro:** You're the definition of a team player, working hand-in-hand with our Head of Social as well as cross-functional teams to ensure that we are prioritizing the right stories, on the right channels, at the right time. You're always open to great ideas, and you live by the "Yes, and" principle to creative concepting.
* **Dare to Be Different:** Under the guidance of our Head of Social, you'll challenge the status quo, dare to be different, and constantly ideate to push the envelope of what's new and interesting on social.

  


**Who You Are:**


* **Innovative Instincts:** You're not just in the social media game; you're rewriting the rules. Bring your trailblazing spirit to our brand, where innovation isn't an option – it's the essence of what we do.
* **Consumer Mastermind:** You've got a pulse on audience insights, and you know what makes them tick. With at least 3+ years navigating the social terrain for major consumer brands, you understand the art of crafting content that captivates and converts.
* **Strategic Storyteller:** Your content isn't just eye-catching; it's narrative artistry. We need a creator who can spin strategic stories, turning clicks into connections, and engagements into brand love. And of course, a copy genius, crafting clear, compelling, and clever messages.
* **Visual Artist:** From stunning video edits to striking graphics, you know not only how to *tell* a story, but how to bring it to life in the most beautiful – and impactful – way.
* **Data Dynamo:** Numbers aren't just digits; they're your compass. You extract creative insights with finesse, and have a demonstrated track record of customer listening and shaping actionable reports and recommendations.
* **Brand Alchemist:** Transforming a brand isn't a task; it's your calling. Your ability to infuse life into a brand, making it resonate with our audience, is what sets you apart. You're not just managing social content; you're sculpting brand perceptions.
* **Dynamic Operator:** Change isn't a challenge; it's an opportunity. Your agility in adapting to the ever-evolving social landscape, as well as lifestyle consumer brands, will help you not just succeed – but thrive – in this role.
* **Community Maestro:** Building communities isn't a duty; it's a passion. You understand that behind every like, comment, and share is a potential advocate. You love fostering and growing community with the same zeal that you approach your creative craft.


**Detail Obsessed: From timelines to typos, you believe** ***details matter*****, and relentlessly ensure our social content reflects our brand commitment to excellence.**


**Additional Details:**


* This is a full-time exempt position headquartered in Denver, CO, working a hybrid schedule. *Remote applicants will be considered*.
* Targeted compensation range for this role: $70K-$80K/year
* Our total rewards package includes competitive compensation, generous PTO, volunteer days off, health benefits (Medical, Dental, Vision, Disability), 401K, and paid Parental leave. In addition, we offer free design services, furniture discounts, and merchandise credits.
* Havenly is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Havenly's employment decisions are made without regard with race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation, or any other legally protected status.
* Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis.

  

  

As a company, our goal is to make everyone feel good at home and that starts right here, at Havenly HQ. We celebrate our differences and encourage everyone to bring their true selves to work each and every day. Throughout the journey of each of our team members, as a company, we take pride in and commit to ensuring that everyone feels valued, heard, welcome and has equal opportunity to thrive. With the above stated, Havenly is committed to cultivating a diverse and inclusive team. We are open to candidates of all backgrounds and encourage you to apply if interested.

title: Social Media Manager
description:
Come join SheerID–one of the fastest-growing and best places to work in the country. We're looking for a dynamic and creative Social Media Manager that is passionate about social media, has a strong understanding of current trends and has the knack for creating captivating and engaging content. The Social Media Specialist will be instrumental in developing and implementing social media strategies to enhance our brand presence and establish meaningful relationships with our target audience. As a member of our dynamic, creative team you’ll be working alongside product marketing, content marketing and demand generation teams. If you're ready for an opportunity to make a real business impact in your next role, read on.  

  

SheerID’s core values of RISE (Recognition, Integrity, Speed, Empathy) mean we value openness, collaboration, kindness, and inclusion in all aspects of our day-to-day work. Ultimately, our team relationships make SheerID one of Inc Magazine’s best workplaces– and they are why we will continue to outperform over the long term.  

As a Social Media Manager, you’ll play a critical role within the marketing team, developing great ideas, producing engaging, relevant content, and keeping a good balance between speed and quality. You’ll ensure that unique, engaging and search-friendly content is created for the brand and track engagement by the target audience.
### **Role Specific Job Duties**

* Craft and curate high-quality content for various social channels, including LinkedIn, Facebook, X (formerly known as Twitter), and TikTok.
* Manage a social media calendar in alignment with business priorities, responsible for composing, editing, and posting content across all platforms.
* Manage agencies to develop content to be placed in social channels and the media.
* Work with VP of Product Marketing and Communications to develop a news release calendar. Work with outside agenices and consultants to pitch the news media.
* Engage and build a customer community, creating a true two-way dialogue with our target audience, involving activities such as (but not limited to) engaging in the comments section.
* Collaborate across the marketing department to plan and execute larger marketing initiatives, campaigns, and programs across all social channels while ensuring social content aligns with the overall marketing strategy.
* Implement best practices for hashtags, tagging, and posting strategies across various channels.
* Ideate content collaboratively with cross-functional teams to create resonant material for our social communities.
* Use data to analyze and optimize content based on key insights, focusing on engagement, audience growth, traffic, conversion, and sentiment.
* Report on channel and campaign performance and make tactical and strategic and adjustments for content optimization.
* Provide community feedback, analysis, key insights and opportunities to engage the customer community.
* Find innovative ways to create a deeper relationship between brand and consumers on social media.
* Additional duties as assigned

### **Required Skills / Experience**

* Minimum 3-5 years of experience in social media, public relations, content production, or community management.
* Creativity and a passion for social media and story development.
* Experience with social media management tools like Hootsuite, Google, and YouTube Analytics.
* Proficiency in Adobe Creative suite including video editing and graphic design.
* Exceptional writing skills with a keen attention to detail.
* Strong interpersonal and relationship-building skills.
* Detail-oriented with excellent organizational and time management skills.
* Ability to adapt to a fast-paced and ever-changing digital landscape

*SheerID is an equal opportunity employer. All aspects of employment including the decision to hire, promote, discipline, or discharge, will be based on merit, competence, performance, and business needs. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all candidates and employees. SheerID believes that diversity and inclusion are critical to our success as a company, and we seek to recruit, develop, and retain the most talented people from a diverse candidate pool.*

title: Social Media Manager
description:
**Job Title: Social Media Manager**

**Location: Remote**

**Employment Type: Full-Time, Salaried**

**Company Overview:**

We are a dynamic lead generation company committed to delivering innovative solutions to our clients. Our approach focuses on leveraging the latest digital strategies to optimize lead generation and conversion rates. We are looking for a highly motivated and experienced Social Media Manager to join our team. This role is ideal for someone who is passionate about social media marketing, has a proven track record in the lead generation space **(specifically in the legal industry)** and is adept at creating engaging content that drives results.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Develop and implement a comprehensive social media strategy that aligns with our lead generation goals.
* Create and manage all published content on LinkedIn, Instagram and TikTok
* Oversee design (i.e.social media graphics, cover photos, thumbnails on LinkedIn, Instagram and TikTok for multiple brands)
* Analyze key metrics and tweak strategy as needed.
* Compile reports showcasing ROI and suggest improvements to management.
* Stay current with social media trends and tools to and ensure Inbounds.com social pages are up to date with current trends as well as ensuring compliance in all activities
* Continue to refine and define our social marketing process and share ideas with management on ways to improve our social presence.
* Manage social media advertising campaigns, including budget allocation, targeting strategies, ad creative development, and performance tracking.
* Prepare regular reports and presentations for senior management, summarizing key social media metrics, insights, and recommendations.
* Develop and implement innovative social media strategies to increase brand visibility, engagement, and conversion rates.
* Create and manage a content calendar that includes engaging and relevant content for various social media platforms, ensuring consistency in brand voice and messaging (LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, & TikTok)

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field.
* **Minimum of 5 years of social media management experience within the legal industry (MUST HAVE)**
* Demonstrable experience with social analytics tools.
* Knowledge of online marketing and a good understanding of major marketing channels.
* Excellent writing, editing (photo/video/text), presentation, and communication skills.
* Demonstrable social analytics tools knowledge.
* Positive attitude, detail, and customer-oriented with good multitasking and organizational ability.
* Fluency in English.

**What We Offer:**

* Competitive salary with performance incentives.
* The ability to work remotely.
* Opportunities for professional development and career growth.
* A dynamic and supportive team environment.
* Health Insurance
* 401k

**Compensation package:** 

$80-$100k

**How to Apply:**

To apply, please send your resume and links to your social media profiles or portfolios showcasing your previous work in social media marketing, particularly in lead generation within the legal vertical.

**Deadline for Application: Feb 29th, 2024**

*\\*We are an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.\\**

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $80,000.00 - $100,000.00 per year

Benefits:

* 401(k)
* Health insurance
* Paid time off

Schedule:

* 8 hour shift

Work Location: Remote

title: Social Media Manager (Canada, Remote)
description:
The Knowledge Society (TKS) is a global human accelerator focused on developing young people (ages 13-18) to impact billions. In TKS, students learn about solving problems using emerging technologies, develop foundational mindsets, and build real-world skills, while being part of a global community of like-minded people.


Our vision is to help create the next generation of unicorn people - people who create the future. In 2020, TKS was recognized by The World Economic Forum as a "School of the Future" and was also featured in Forbes, BBC, and the Fast Company.


We currently have 4,000+ students and alumni from over 300 cities globally. Our alumni have started venture-backed companies, performed cutting-edge research, presented at the world's largest conferences, and are creating solutions to tackle important problems like maternal mortality, disease, and energy.

**The Social Media Manager Position:**
======================================

TKS trains young people to solve important problems in the world, and we're often asked *"how do the students hear about you?”*.


In reality, there isn't a one-size-fits-all answer to that question. Approximately 19% of TKS students stumbled upon us through Instagram, 14% via Snapchat, 17% on TikTok, 24% through Discord, and the list goes on...


In a nutshell, our lean Growth team is operating at full capacity. Here's where you come in! You get the chance to find and interact with the world’s smartest youth and biggest brands to bring TKS to life on our social channels. Our students live in 65 countries, attend the best schools, speak on the world’s largest stages (SXSW, WebSummit & Gitex) and intern at top companies like Tesla, NASA, Google and more. You’ll have a front row seat to the adventure.


We’re looking for a **Social Media Manager** to join our Growth team. Our ideal candidate will take full responsibility for the social KPIs including a target to double followers across all channels by the end of 2024. You’ll have an understanding of trends, tools and an ability to make viral content.

 **You will be reporting to** the head of growth.

**You will be responsible for:**
--------------------------------

* Increasing performance of the TKS social channels. This includes increasing engagement, followers and shares on each channel. Overall followers should double by the end of 2024.
* Create a strategic content calendar to achieve KPIs
* Monitoring social media channels for industry trends, interacting with users and responding to social media messages, inquiries, and comments
* Sourcing and coordinating influencers to represent TKS and amplify our exposure
* Creating viral content (with assistance from designers and video editors)
* Evolve the TKS brand by developing graphics that convey our brand and message appropriately
* Reviewing analytics, reporting on channel KPIs, and meeting set growth targets

**Skills & Experience We're Looking For:**
------------------------------------------

* 3+ years of social media management or related experience
* Experience with social media management tools (Hootsuite, Sprout etc.)
* Experience with video editing and content creation
* Strong written communication (English)

**We'll geek out if you:**
==========================

* Have worked in a similar capacity within a start-up environment
* Are organized, yet creative
* You've built a following before, for groups or third-parties specifically
* Have done some copywriting or editing in past roles, or projects
* Are able to critically link the content you're building to a bigger strategy
* Are eager to learn, make revers-able mistakes and play a significant role in the TKS story

**Why you might get excited about this role:**
----------------------------------------------

* You have a ton of ideas on how to grow our socials, and you're ready for a sandbox environment to test them out
* You get excited about every new follower, seeing that number climb drives you
* You're interested in Social Media Marketing as a career
* You're excited to receive coaching from experienced marketers, sharpening your abilities

**Why you might \\*\\*NOT\\*\\* be excited about this role:**
---------------------------------------------------------

* The field of marketing is interesting to you, but coming up with new ideas for content each day sounds draining
* Having to align with a broader strategy takes all the fun away from social media

**Perks of joining our team:**
------------------------------

* Dynamic environment that supports growth and role progression
* You will be a part of high performing team and surrounded by an innovative culture with a “figure it out” mindset
* Build relationships with a network of influential people

**Resources to learn more about TKS**
=====================================


Below we've included some resources that you can check out to get a deeper understanding about TKS, including podcasts from our founders and videos of our students.


Video: What Does Ambition Mean?


Podcast: Nadeem & TKS Philosophy


TEDx Talk: Human Potential


Forbes: Equipping Youth To...


Video: TKShowcase Highlights


Podcast: Navid & TKS Story


Fast Company: Where Tomorrow's...


Video: TKS Changed My Mindset


#LI-REMOTE

title: Digital Content, Email Marketing & Social Media Manager
description:
**About us**

We believe that actors don’t have to be struggling artists. Every actor has a gift that the world needs. We’ve helped thousands of actors around the world become successful and the formula is as simple as ABC: -game mentality, usiness know-how, raft.There are countless coaches who teach craft, and plenty of personal development gurus out there, but not a lot of business experts with first-hand knowledge and a proven track record.

Career ACTivate is the leading organization giving actors the business know-how to get more auditions, book better work, and find great representation. If there’s something that you want that you don’t have, it just means that there’s something you don’t know yet. That’s where we come in to support actors in having the career and life they want.

We are seeking a dynamic and creative Content, Email Marketing and Social Media Manager to join our team! In this role, you will be responsible for developing and implementing our content strategy across Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and email newsletters. Your goal will be to enhance our brand presence, engage our audience, drive traffic to our website, and get actors interested in our courses and Program.

**Key Responsibilities**

* **Content Strategy Development**: Create and implement a comprehensive content strategy that aligns with Career ACTivate’s goals and our audience’s interests.
* **Content Creation and Management**: Produce high-quality content for our social media platforms and weekly email newsletter. This includes creating graphics & reels, editing & producing 5-8 minute long-form videos, and writing a weekly newsletter.
* **Social Media Management**: Manage our social media profiles, including content planning, posting, engagement, and analytics. Stay up-to-date with the latest social media trends and best practices.
* **Email Newsletter Management**: Design and execute email marketing campaigns, aligning with the marketing campaigns developed by the team. This includes newsletters, promotional emails, and targeted socials campaigns.
* **Brand Voice and Messaging**: Ensure a consistent brand voice and messaging across all content and platforms.
* **Analytics and Reporting**: Track and analyze performance metrics to gauge content effectiveness and adjust strategies as needed.
* **Audience Engagement**: Foster community engagement, respond to comments and inquiries, and build relationships with followers.
* **Collaboration**: Work closely with other team members and Career ACTivate Coaches to ensure a cohesive brand strategy and to gather insights for content creation.

**Qualifications**

* Proven experience in content creation, social media management, and email marketing.
* Strong writing and copy-editing skills, with attention to detail.
* Proficiency in social media platforms: Instagram, TikTok and Facebook.
* Basic design skills and familiarity with design software (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite, Canva).
* Basic video editing skills.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
* Ability to analyze data and derive actionable insights.
* Creative mindset with the ability to generate innovative ideas.
* Strong organizational and time-management skills.

**Time Commitment**

Approximately 8-15 hours/week

**What We Offer**

* A friendly work-from-home environment
* Flexible hours - we’re actors too so we know what it’s like to have stuff come up last-minute!
* Opportunities for professional growth and development
* Business-of-acting information that you can use in your own career
* This is a part-time, remote position

**To Apply**

Email support@careeractivate.com with the subject line DCSMO/[First Name Last Name]/ [Desired Hourly Rate] and answers to the following:

* What are the 3 strongest skills that make you a good fit?Bullet point your experience (if any) in the entertainment industry. It’s okay if you haven’t had any entertainment experience.
* What are the first 3 immediate improvements you would implement on our IG account?
* Share a sample of copy you’ve written that you’re proud of. This could be a social media caption or an email.
* Attach a PDF version of your resume.

**Deadline to Submit**

ASAP (we are looking to hire someone who is a great fit as soon as possible)

Job Type: Part-time

Pay: $5.00 - $25.00 per hour

Expected hours: 8 – 15 per week

Benefits:

* Flexible schedule

Schedule:

* Choose your own hours

Experience:

* Marketing: 1 year (Preferred)

Work Location: Remote

title: US Social Media Manager (Permanent Work from Home)
description:
**Job Description:**

A Social Media Manager oversees a company’s interactions with the public by implementing social media platforms’ content strategies. Duties include analyzing engagement data, identifying trends in customer interactions, and planning digital campaigns to build community online.

**Duties & Responsibilities:** 

* Performs research on current benchmark trends and audience preferences.
* Designs and implements social media strategy to align with business goals.
* Sets specific objectives and report on ROI.
* Generates, edits, publishes, and shares engaging content daily (e.g. original text, photos, videos, and news).
* Monitors SEO and web traffic metrics.
* Collaborates with other teams to ensure brand consistency.
* Communicates with followers, responds to queries promptly, and monitors customer reviews.
* Oversees social media account design (e.g. Facebook timeline cover, profile pictures, and blog layout).
* Suggests and implements new features to develop brand awareness, like promotions and competitions.
* Stay up-to-date with current technologies and trends in social media, design tools, applications, and best practices.
* Reports directly to the Executive Director of Strategy.

**Qualifications:** 

* Minimum of 3-5 years of experience as a Social Media Manager, Content Creator, or Marketer in a multimedia agency, advertising, or design industry
* Passionate about content creation and knowledgeable about the latest changes in social apps i.e. Tiktok/Instagram/Pinterest and other social media platforms
* Has hands-on experience in content management with a solid portfolio demonstrating excellence in content creation, copywriting, performance measurement, research, and calendar planning.
* Demonstrated ability to confidently, easily, and clearly communicate creative solutions to internal teams and clients.
* Knowledge of multiple social media platforms and a team leader are required.
* Proficiency in all things Google; especially Google Sheets.
* You must be a US Citizen
* Must have the following: a) Own computer unit; b) Stable lined/wired internet connection and backup; c) and backup power supply.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $35,000.00 - $70,000.00 per year

Schedule:

* Monday to Friday

Application Question(s):

* May we have the link to your creative portfolio or sample works?
* Do you have your own computer?
* Do you have lined/wired internet?
* Do you have a backup internet and power supply?

Experience:

* Social media management: 3 years (Required)
* Content creation: 5 years (Required)
* Team management: 5 years (Required)

Work Location: Remote

title: Manager, Social Media
description:
**Job Location:** Hybrid – LA preferred


**THE COMPANY:**


Since 1945, EBONY has celebrated and chronicled Black excellence and leadership worldwide. In January 2021, the iconic brand was relaunched under new ownership as EBONY Media Group, a diversified multi-platform media company. This is an exciting chapter for the beloved brand, and we are looking for talented, enthusiastic candidates to join our close-knit, highly collaborative team. We’re calling all innovators and creators who want to be part of the legacy by helping shape EBONY’s future!


**THE ROLE:**


The Manager, Social Media at EBONY is a creative, social strategist passionate about storytelling, social media and about the EBONY legacy of delivering excellence to the global Black community.


This role will play an integral part in redefine who EBONY is today across the digital landscape by creating and publishing engaging content across EBONY’s social media channels. As a strategic thought leader, this role will manage cross-functional social media campaigns from start to finish and develop content strategics by partnering with both internal and external stakeholders.


A proactive content strategy will be key in this role and EBONY is looking to bring on a team player who is not only proactive, but intentional and thinks social-first. The Manager, Social Media will sit within the Brand & Marketing department on the Social Media team and will report directly to the Director, Social Media. This is a game-changing and exciting opportunity to reimagine one of the most well-known and beloved media brands in the world.


**RESPONSIBILITIES:**


* **Content Strategy + Campaign Management**
	+ Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders of all levels to complete tasks from larger ideation to day-to-to social posts.
	+ Identify unique, creative and social-first ways to execute campaign ideas
	+ Ability to build and manage social campaigns from soup to nuts (creative concepting, pitching, strategy building, publishing and reporting)
	+ Experience working within third-party social tool platforms (i.e., Sprout, or Sprinklr)
	+ Comfortable public speaking and presenting to leadership and stakeholders on reports, campaign ideas, etc.
* **Social-First Mindset:**
	+ Deep professional, working understanding of social media platforms.
	+ Stay up to date on the latest social trends and experience trend forecasting.
	+ Able to translate business needs in a social-first way to a digital audience.
	+ Social copywriting and copy-editing experience for brand content
	+ Ability to creative direct social creative and campaigns to agencies and internal stakeholders
* **Project Management:**
* Ability to project manage large campaigns and ability to multitask.
* Possess organizational skills and able plan social content calendars in advance.
* Willing to travel to on-site events and capture content/creative direct content capture while maintaining day-to-day responsibilities.


* **Qualifications:**
	+ At least 4 years of hands-on social media experience managing social creative campaigns from start to finish inclusive of pitching ideas, execution, publishing and reporting.
	+ Experience managing brand accounts and writing social copy in a brand forward tone of voice.
	+ Deep knowledge and interest social media, trends and platform insights
	+ Team player with a positive attitude and go-getter mindset
	+ Must have experience in Microsoft systems (i.e., Excel, PowerPoint)
	+ Must have experience using social media publishing reporting tools (i.e.., Sprout and Sprinklr)
	+ EBONY is an incredibly fast-paced environment on top of the social media landscape being always-on
	+ The Manger, Social Media must be agile, proactive and able to project manage multiple social media campaigns at once.

title: Social Media Content Manager - AdsManager experience - Remote
description:
Vettanna is seeking a Content Manager/Content Strategist IV for a 6 month Temporary Labor project with our Fortune 100 client. This is an opportunity to get valuable experience with a global leader in social media.This position is 100% remote. Hourly pay is based on your location.

  

 The main function of a social media content manager/strategist is to partner with designers, product managers, researchers and product marketers to plan and create the content for products.

Skills/Behaviors
