title: Social Media Manager
company: Lifetime Health Plus Care Pvt Ltd
description:
**Job Title:** Social Media Marketing Manager

**Company:** Lifetime Health

**Location:** Bangalore, India

**Experience:** 3-4 years in social media marketing, preferably with app-based companies and influencers in the healthcare sector.

**About Lifetime Health:**

Lifetime Health is a rapidly growing healthcare home service startup dedicated to providing convenient and accessible healthcare solutions to individuals and families in Bangalore. Our mission is to leverage technology to deliver high-quality healthcare services, enhancing the well-being of our community.

**Job Description:**

As a Social Media Marketing Manager at Lifetime Health, you will play a pivotal role in developing and executing our social media strategy to drive brand awareness, engage with our audience, and expand our reach in the healthcare sector. You will be responsible for collaborating with influencers, creating engaging content, and optimizing our social media channels for maximum impact.

**Responsibilities:**

**Social Media Strategy:** Develop and execute a comprehensive social media strategy aligned with the company's goals and target audience.

**Content Creation:** Create high-quality, engaging, and informative content including video content for various social media platforms, including but not limited to Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

**Influencer Collaboration:** Identify and collaborate with healthcare influencers and partners to promote Lifetime Health's services and products.

**Community Engagement:** Monitor and engage with the online community, responding to comments, messages, and feedback promptly and professionally.

**Analytics and Reporting:** Track key performance indicators (KPIs) and provide regular reports on the effectiveness of social media campaigns. Adjust strategies as needed to optimize performance.

**Ad Campaign Management:** Plan and execute paid social media advertising campaigns to increase brand visibility and drive user acquisition.

**Brand Consistency:** Ensure that all social media content aligns with the company's branding guidelines and messaging.

**Stay Updated:** Keep up-to-date with industry trends, social media best practices, and emerging platforms to ensure our strategies remain innovative and effective.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
* 2-3 years of experience in social media marketing, preferably with app-based companies and influencers in the healthcare sector.
* Proven track record of successfully managing and growing social media channels.
* Strong understanding of social media analytics and reporting tools.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
* Creative mindset with the ability to think outside the box.
* Familiarity with healthcare and wellness trends is a plus.

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: ₹40,000.00 - ₹60,000.00 per month

Experience:

* total work: 2 years (Preferred)

Work Location: In person

title: Marketing Manager
description:
**Company Overview**

The Sagar Hospitals® is a prestigious healthcare services institution with two tertiary care multi-specialty hospitals, four clinics, and a chain of 12 pharmacies. We are a division of the esteemed 400 INR Crore Sagar Group, established in 1960. Our healthcare services have achieved a global brand status, bringing pride to Bangalore. We have received various accreditations and are known for our medical and technological successes.

**Job Overview**

We are looking for an experienced Senior International Marketing professional to join our team at Sagar Hospitals. As the International Marketing Manager, you will be responsible for developing and implementing marketing strategies to expand our brand presence globally. This is a full-time position based in Bangalore, India, and requires a minimum of 7 to 10 years of experience in international marketing.

**Qualifications and Skills**

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field
* Proven experience in international marketing, preferably in the healthcare industry
* Strong understanding of global markets and cultural nuances
* Creativity and ability to think outside the box to develop innovative marketing strategies
* Proficiency in social media platforms and marketing tools
* Strong analytical thinking and problem-solving skills
* Excellent leadership and project management abilities
* Knowledge of advertising techniques and principles
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
* Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment

**Roles and Responsibilities**

* Develop and execute international marketing strategies to promote our brand and services
* Identify and analyze market trends and competitive landscape to identify opportunities and threats
* Drive international market research and competitor analysis to understand and adapt to market dynamics
* Plan and oversee marketing campaigns and initiatives targeted at international markets
* Manage and coordinate with external agencies, partners, and vendors to execute marketing activities
* Create compelling marketing collateral, including brochures, presentations, and website content
* Utilize social media platforms and digital marketing tools to enhance brand visibility and engagement
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure consistent messaging and branding across all channels
* Monitor and report on the effectiveness of marketing campaigns and initiatives
* Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in international marketing

**Location:** Jaipur

**Employment Type:** Fulltime

**Position Overview:**

We are seeking a dynamic and creative Brand Manager to lead our branding efforts. The

successful candidate will be responsible for developing, implementing, and managing our end-

to-end branding strategy and content creation efforts. This role requires a deep understanding

of various branding and marketing principles, social media platforms, media channels,

exceptional communication skills, and a passion for storytelling through engaging content.

**Responsibilities:**

· Design a comprehensive brand marketing strategy across all channels - digital, offline and PR.

· Execute marketing strategies effectively and to enhance brand presence and drive business growth.

· Develop and implement a strategic content plan that supports the company's business goals, reflects our brand voice, and meets our target audience's needs throughout the inbound marketing funnel.

· Conduct market research to grasp market trends, customer needs, and competitive insights, informing our content strategy.

· Maintain brand consistency across all content production, upholding our identity and messaging standards.

· Work closely with marketing, sales, and product teams to develop a cohesive content calendar that maps precisely to the stages of the customer journey.

· Interacting with building relationships with Influencers, journalists and media outlets for brand promotion.

title: Digital Marketer
description:
As a Digital Marketing Manager, you will be responsible for developing, implementing, and managing the overall digital marketing strategy for our organization. You will play a crucial role in driving online brand awareness, lead generation, and customer acquisition through various digital channels. The successful candidate will have a strong understanding of digital marketing trends, data analysis, and a proven track record of successful digital campaigns.

**Responsibilities:**

* **Digital Strategy Development:**
* Develop and execute comprehensive digital marketing strategies aligned with business goals.
* Identify key performance indicators (KPIs) and set targets for various digital channels.
* **Online Brand Presence:**
* Manage and enhance the organization's online presence across digital platforms.
* Ensure consistency in brand messaging and positioning.
* **Content Marketing:**
* Oversee content creation for digital channels, including website, blogs, social media, and email campaigns.
* Collaborate with content creators to ensure content aligns with the overall digital strategy.
* **Social Media Management:**
* Develop and implement social media strategies to increase brand awareness and engagement.
* Monitor social media channels, respond to comments, and analyze social media metrics.
* **Email Marketing:**
* Plan and execute email marketing campaigns, including segmentation, A/B testing, and performance analysis.
* Manage email lists, ensuring compliance with relevant regulations.
* **SEO and SEM:**
* Optimize website content for search engines (SEO) to improve organic search visibility.
* Plan and manage search engine marketing (SEM) campaigns, including keyword research and bid management.
* **Analytics and Reporting:**
* Utilize analytics tools to track and report on the performance of digital marketing campaigns.
* Provide insights and recommendations for continuous improvement.
* **Budget Management:**
* Develop and manage the digital marketing budget effectively.
* Allocate resources to different digital channels based on performance and goals.
* **Collaboration and Coordination:**
* Work closely with cross-functional teams, including sales, product development, and design, to align digital marketing efforts with overall business objectives.
* Collaborate with external agencies and vendors when necessary.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field. Master's degree is a plus.
* Proven experience as a Digital Marketing Manager or in a similar role.
* In-depth knowledge of digital marketing channels, tools, and best practices.
* Strong analytical skills and data-driven mindset.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
* Proficiency in digital marketing software and tools.

We are seeking a skilled PR Manager to join our team. The PR Manager will be responsible for developing and implementing PR strategies to promote our company's image and enhance its reputation.

title: Content Manager
description:
**Content Manager**



Chennai, India

  

The Fulfillment Manager: Content will be responsible for overseeing the content writing fulfillment team within the Marketing Services business unit of Vendasta. They will be responsible for the management, growth, and training of this team which covers fulfillment of both shortform and longform content across, social media posts, web copy, and blog content. A successful Fulfillment Manager will have extensive experience in a customer service role and a passion for providing the highest level of support, quality delivery of the services purchased and service delivery at all times, while also coaching and helping their team to do the same.
  

  

The candidate for this role is expected to have experience and shown competencies in training new team members in social media best practices in producing quality content, upskilling writers who have been in the marketing industry for 6+ months, as well as experience conducting performance management for under-performing team members.  

  

This role is best suited for candidates who would be comfortable maintaining an environment of pressure without creating stress, and leading with kindness and compassion.

 **Your Impact:**


* Deliver Social Content fulfillment services within given service level expectations to help SMBs reach their digital marketing goals.
* Lead a team in writing excellent, target market-related copy for social media and longform content platforms.
* Assist with the resolution of customer issues as they pertain to the writing fulfillment suite and associated products
* Drive improvements to processes and techniques
* Work with team members on escalations, which includes joining calls as a leadership representative
* Analyze team statistics, KPIs, and compile accurate reports with actionable outcomes based on the data
* Oversee and monitor tasks as they pertain to the writing fulfillment suite, and ensure timely completion of tasks
* Maintain an orderly workflow according to priorities
* Manage and motivate team to achieve SLEs and provide great service to our partners and customers
* Support a positive and professional learning environment
* Facilitate the ongoing training of team members as needed to help them perform their duties at the highest level
* Complete weekly 1 on 1’s with team members and report team development
* Identify partner opportunities and common friction points to help partners grow and help local businesses find success with their digital presence
* Identify growth opportunities within the writing fulfillment suite and work with internal and external stakeholders to improve the product offering
* Stay current with social media trends and the newest feature releases from Vendasta’s O&O products and platform.
* Seamlessly integrate workflows and processes with the overseas counterpart and optimize teams to be a global fulfillment team.

  


**What You Bring to the Table:**


* Proven experience in a leadership role & strong leadership skills with ability to motivate team members
* Ability to translate skills to other employees through coaching
* Ability to multitask, be decisive, and remain calm under pressure
* Exceptional interpersonal, customer service, communication, and conflict resolution skills
* Knowledge of management principles and familiarity with company products, services, and policies
* Proficiency with the necessary technology (computers, software applications, phone systems, etc.)
* Proficiency with Vendasta O&O products, including but not limited to Vendasta Task Manager, Social Marketing, etc and the overall Vendasta platform considered an asset.
* Proven work experience as a copywriter or similar role
* Hands-on experience using various social media platforms and industry knowledge on the latest social media trends.

  


**Responsible for the following KPIs:**


* # Posts Completed by team
* Word Count completed by team
* Team Utilization Metrics
* Quality Assurance Metrics
* Days to Delivery
* Overdue Tasks

  


**About Vendasta:**



So what do we actually do? Vendasta is a SaaS company composed of a company of global brands including; MatchCraft, Yesware and Broadly, that builds and sells software and services to help small businesses operate more efficiently as a team, meet more client needs, and provide incredible client experiences. We have offices in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan, Boston ad Boca Raton Florida and Chennai, India.

 **Perks:**


* Benefits - Health insurance
* Paid time offs
* Training & Career Development - Professional development plans, leadership workshops, mentorship programs, and more!
* Free Snacks, hot beverages, and catered lunches on Fridays
* Culture - comprised of our core values: Drive, Innovation, Respect, and Agility
* Provident Fund

title: Sales Executive

title: Sales and Marketing Manager
description:
Assistant Manager- Sales & Marketing will be primarily responsible for executing the sales strategy of the resort with the ultimate objective of maximizing revenues by optimum usage of online and offline platforms

Key Duties & Responsibilities

* Devise and implement the overall sales and marketing plan for the resort and actively monitor its progress in terms of achieving KPI’s, budgets and revenues.
* To be responsible to develop and foster business through pro-active online and offline platforms.
* Liaise with the General Manager in adopting sales strategies for the resort
* Build-on and develop relationships with major agencies for promoting the resort
* Analyse current markets and identify new markets and potential clients.
* To optimise and achieve sales and revenue generation through digital marketing initiatives and social media campaigns
* Effective usage of all tools including telemarketing, direct mail, appointment calls etc.
* Manage the number and performance of third party and promotional websites and liaise with providers in ensuring optimisation of the resort’s online position.
* Proactively monitor the Resort’s profile on the various social media platforms and ensure appropriate responses are posted in a timely fashion.
* Liaise with outsourced Digital Team in managing the content of the Resort’s website.
* Manage all promotional collateral from copyright through to design and print and ensure that it is in line with our branding
* Ensure in house promotional material is current, effective and supports any new sales and marketing promotions.
* Manage the guest database and ensure that client’s details are accurate and UpToDate.
* Ensure that all client correspondence is tracked and recorded, including quotations and contracts.
* Represent the resort at consumer trade fairs, mall promotions and tourism events both at local and national level.
* Maintain the highest standards of professional conduct at all times when dealing with clients, guests etc.
* Conduct weekly snapshot meetings with GM update on activities/sales to date and plans for the weeks ahead.
* To prepare and submit weekly Sales & Marketing activity reports to the GM.
* Monitor the progress of sales team through weekly/ monthly activity reports
* Encourage positive working relations with all departments by regular communications and feedback.
